Enter stage left Pieter Geldenhuys the owner of PG Tops to the rescue. The day was simply brilliant. Picked up in a smart air-conditioned vehicle complete with refreshments, Pieter set about asking us questions to see what made us tick so he could match the wineries to our personalities and interests which I thought was a great touch. We visited 3 (or 4, I forget!) vineyards, each of them stunning yet uniquely different. Pieter thought very carefully where to take us and nailed it each time as we had the full spectrum of experiences. From the beauty and tranquility of Solms-Delta, a vineyard with an intriguing history and the charismatic Leon to recount it, through to the opulence of the Provence vineyard with its distinctly french feel. All the wines (and food we had) were superb but Solms Delta was the standout for us simply for its authentic South African feel, history and the fact its set up as a trust so that the workers all benefit from its success. I bought 60 bottles there!In addition to the fabulous wine adventure, Pieter also asked us if there was anything else we wanted to do so he took us to a huge, vibrant, uniquely South African open air bar in a township. Hundreds of friendly people with their families enjoying one of the biggest BBQ come dances in a bar I am sure I will ever see. It was brilliant because it was real life. We ended what was a great day with Pieter dropping us off in Camps Bay for dinner. I really do highly recommend PG Tops because apart from Pieter and his team being genuinely nice, they put the effort in to make your day what you want, so there is not just one formula here and I thought it was great value for money especially since the day is tailored to your interests. Thanks again Pieter.

The Perfect Way to Visit the Wine Region of South Africa!. We had two sets of friends coming to visit us while spending 3 weeks in Kalk Bay, South Africa. We debated on whether we should drive them ourselves our hire a touring firm to visit the wineries. (We knew which wineries we wanted to visit). The best decision we made was to hire PG Tops Travel and have Roelf as our driver/guide both times. Instead of watching the road and worrying about getting lost we were able to relax and view the gorgeous South African scenery and actually wine taste while visiting the many vineyards. The vehicle was nice and roomy, Roelf was always on time, friendly, informative and patient when we needed extra time. We lunched at Dieu Donne winery both trips where we had delicious food and the most amazing views. We would definitely enlist PG Tops Travel again and Roelf on any return visit!

Use PG Tops!. My husband and I travelled to SA to celebrate my birthday and finding Yolanda and Peter to show us Cape Town & Stellenbosch was brilliant! I've already recommended them to friends who are planning their trips out there. They both made us feel like friends rather than tourists! Book em!

A fantastic way to see Cape Town. Yolanda (at PG Tops) made our trip extra special- great advice, flexible schedules, knowledgeable guides-nothing was too much trouble. But best of all, she was a delight as a host and guide. We saw everything and had a lot of fun. Well recommended.

You couldnt ask for more!. It was our first trip to Cape Town and everything was just perfect! Peter helped me plan the daily itinerary -- city/table mountain, winelands, cape peninsula tours and pre-booked all tickets to robben island --and no question was left unanswered (and believe me I had lots - what with 3 young kids in tow)! The pacing of the whole visit was just right, kids were never too tired or too bored. From the time we were picked up in the airport to the day we left, we just had so much fun with Yolanda. My kids loved her! She was so patient and even went shell picking with them during the Cape Peninsula tour. All the stops we made, the restos, wineries, sights, animal farms (i.e. ostrich, cheetah, butterfly farms, etc) were fantastic. Yolanda offered honest practical tips and insights which we appreciated. In fact, my husband and I just sat back and enjoyed all the drives as Yolanda entertained us all. I can truly say that our stay in Cape Town was truly memorable because of Yolanda and Peter! I definitely recommend the PGTops team anytime!

We are a couple with a baby, PG Tops handled it great!. I was in Cape Town for a few days with my husband and our little baby boy who was just 8 months old. My husband and I wanted to do the wine tour and visit the town a bit, but doing things with a small baby is not always easy...Yolanda and PG Tops handled the entire situation amazingly. They organized the trip to the wines and some sightseeing, and were given all the time and flexibility for the baby’s meals and naps. Plus, while and my husband and I were enjoying the wines and the trip, Yolanda was great with the baby, taking care and playing with him.As a result: we had a wonderful time with no stress at all, because we could enjoy the trip and the wines, and our baby was happy and comfortable the whole time.Thank you PG Tops!!!

Fabulous, Friendly, informative service. Visited Cape Town in Sept.Yolanda picked us up from the airport & was very helpful about what to see etc for our first visit. Booked her for a trip to Aquila game reserve and also for a day trip to Cape of Good Hope & then up to Boulder Beach to see the penguins. Got to know her really well in a few days & would definitely recommend PG Tops tours to anyone. They cater to your wishes so you are not just on a set tour. Can't wait to go back.

Fantastic week covering lots of ground.... Yolanda and Pieter were great at sorting out a mix of activities and visits, including abseiling and shark cage diving. Friendly, adaptable, and fun. Highly recommended.

Lekker Tour!. My wife and I just returned from a ten-day trip to South Africa, one of the highlights of which was a Cape Peninsula tour with PG Tops. Our guide Yolanda was absolutely fantastic! During the course of the tour she filled us in on every imaginable aspect of history, geography, linguistics, politics, flora and fauna, and did it all with an infectious enthusiasm and an obvious love of her homeland and subject matter. By the end of the day, we felt like we had known her all our lives. From seals to ostriches to baboons to dassies to penguins, we saw it all, and we witnessed the most amazing scenery and vistas this side of Heaven. Not to missed: the hair-raising drive around Chapman's Peak set to Coldplay's "Viva la Vida." At the climax of the song, we rounded the bend to take in the incredible panorama of Long Beach and Noordhoek. Positively mind-blowing. Also worth noting is the invigorating 45-minute trek from Cape of Good Hope to Cape Point, and the hike up to the lighthouse once you get there; the local crafts on display and for sale at Hout Bay; and the architectural charms of Simons Town. All in all, an amazing experience bordering of sensory overload in an absolutely beautiful corner of the world, and a memory that we will cherish for the rest of our lives! Hats off to Yolanda and Pieter!
great people. wonderfull people , great guides , I had a fab time they tailor the trip for you .

The best way to visit South Aftica, period.. PG Tops did a great job of showing the country and experiencing all there is to offer. What a great experience! From the elephant sanctuary to the bungee jump it is not a question of if, but when will I return.Thanks again!

He's one of the best guides in all of South Africa. Traveling with PG Tops was an excellent experience for me. I was traveling with iKapa Tours and they booked me with Pieter for the weekend to do some hiking, visits to the botanical gardens and a visit to a Township. He was on time, and most accommodating for anything I wanted to do. We ended up having such a memorable weekend traveling around all of cape town and seeing things I wanted to see, which meant going outside of the box. We went to the Old Biscuit Mill and watched as the well-to-do South Africans ate their morning away eating delicious bites of wonderful organic fare. The place is a "dont miss" in my books if you plan to be in Cape Town for the weekend. For contract he then took me into town and had me walk through another market, much different than the bright and cheery biscuit mill. This market is the hot spot for the ethnic minded wanting to eat some amazing Indian and African dishes! The smells were to die for! It was dark in there but you could tell this is were flavor really comes through! Although I was alone, he made me feel very at home and was open in sharing all sorts of facets of South African life. We went for a walk along the waterfront where locals take their dogs, visited the botanical gardens, and took me on the most amazing Township tour I've ever been on. Pieter is loved by many and his partners in one of South Africa's largest townships, provided one of the most relevant and non-intrusive look at South Africans who live in Township. This isn't about pointing out a bunch of poverty stricken individuals but rather seeing how people living in these ares are working to create a better life for themselves. Its truly an amazing experience and nothing like I've seen with other outfits and I travel a lot. PG Tops is the only guiding company I will travel with from here on out. You simply can't go wrong with these guys!

Friendly, attentive, felt like family.. Clean bus, friendly and good driver. Attentive, schedule was adapted without a problem after I had a wish to visit a certain winery, which unfortunately didn't exist anymore. A short time request for a visit to Cape Good Hope the next day was immediately arranged by phoning an acquaintance. Very personal but not too. Just right. You should discuss politics with Pieter, he is very well informed. You have to ask him though.

Fantastic tour of Stellenbosch with flexibility and professional panache!. Recently taking a girls trip, 6 ladies met up in South Africa for some holiday fun. PG Tops gave us a fantastic day tour of Stellenbosch. We were guided through some of South Africa's finest vineyards. They were clearly strategically chosen to give a full flavor of all the unique and lovely vineyards that they area has to offer. The day was planned out with an array of vineyards and vino that was top notch. All we had to do was merely show up and the legwork was done for us. The vineyards selected were so original and unlike most of what we would see wine tasting in the US. Essentially, the landscape blows Napa out of the water, and PG Tops excelled at showcasing this region in its full glory. PG Tops arranged for a driver and was completely flexible with timing and drop off, exceedingly cordial, and just in general led us through a fabulous day. Highly recommended utilizing this company on your stay in Cape Town and surrounding areas!

It's like having a local friend give you a tour of their hometown. PG TOps/Peter was awesome. We had limited time and he took us so many places. He even took us to a rugby game when it was all over (for no additional fee) and explained all the rules to us. It felt like we were hanging out with a friend in South Africa and made Cape Town the best part of my trip!

Outstanding tour - Very informative, a blast and Peter was awesome!. I'm always apprehensive about "guided tours" - but this tour changed my mind! I had an absolute blast and learned so much about SA and the history! Things I would have never learned any other way! I did a full day tour and could have kept going. I'd highly suggest this tour company!

Wanting to explore Cape Town? Look this guy up!!. If you want to see Cape Town hang out with Pieter! I have not met a person who is so passionate about their backyard and a couple of hours with him he'll have you hooked. I love my rugby so when I saw he was doing a trip to Newlands to watch the Stormers v Blues i jumped on it straight away. Pre game antics consisted of a braai and a few castle lagers surrounded by hundreds of amped up Stormers supporters with the amazing Table Mountain in the background. It completely blew my mind. The vibe was amazing...oh and the seats werent too bad either! Pieter has so many great day trips, he even tried to get me ostrich riding! Unfortunately I ran out of time but if I ever make it back to Cape Town i'll be looking him up and you should too!

Professional Service With a Smile!. I used Pieter and team for our family holiday to Cape Town. This included the two airport runs and two specific trips during the holiday. Always on time, always polite.Great knowledge of the region and always happy to offer other visit tips which we accepted.A big thanks to Pieter and Roelf.Highly recommended!

Best private tours - saves time and hassle.. When we visit South Africa next time, we will definitely use Pieter G at PG Tops. He is very professional. He took us on a gourmet tour of the winelands. We visited four of the top wineries in the region. We tried the bubbly that was served at the Obama and Mandela inaugurations. Pieter took us for lunch at a winery with spectacular food and a breathtakingly picturesque view. We were short on time, so he made sure we saw as many sights as we could in one day. We were able to go to seal island, see the penguins at Boulder's beach and hike up the Cape of Good Hope. We even managed to see a whale and her calf out of season. His prices are very reasonable as well for a private tour guide. For a few dollars more (not much), he got us a private transfer to and from Hermanus (a 2.5 hour drive)....not to mention, his BMW is much, much nicer and more comfortable than a big tour bus :) I highly recommend PG Tops.

A Wealth of Knowledge. I always appreciate a tour where the guide is not only well-informed about the region but in this case, is also willing to serve as a historical resource. Hank is certainly both. We drove to Hermanus for the day where all along the route I was treated to first-class service and as a solo traveler, I felt at ease where my safety was concerned.I recommend booking Ulungele Tours in advance of your arrival in Cape Town as this company fills up fast with requests. I booked my reservation about a month out, and I was glad I did not wait.

Brilliant - thank you. Fantastic. THANK YOU to Noel George who looked after us so superbly for 4 1/2 days in Cape Town. We did so much with Noel's expert guidance. What a super guy, amazing knowledge and a charming man. We were treated like royalty by Noel and if you have any doubts about how to tour around the Cape Town area please do contact Hank at Ulungele Tours. You are making a great decision.

Best airport transfers and tours. I booked Ulungele for airport transfers from Cape Town Airport to the centre. Hank and Gerhard were prompt, at very competitive rates, and maintained excellent communication - much better than other tour operators I dealt with in Cape Town. And what lovely people! Hank gave excellent advice and options for tours. Unfortunately I didn't have time and funds to book but if you do, I'd strongly recommend you go with Ulungele. You'll have seamless, top quality private tours with very caring and knowledgeable guides and you'll be perfectly looked after. Many thanks Hank!

Excellent tour!. My daughter, niece and I had an excellent time on our day trip safari to/at Inverdoorn Reserve. Our tour guide, Noel, was prompt in picking us up from our hotel in Cape Town. En route to Inverdoorn he was very informative about South Africa and answered all of our many questions on various subjects. He was also easy to talk to, and funny. The safari itself was an amazing experience--something we'd do again. After the safari was over Inverdoorn fed us a great meal and dessert. The entire day from start to finish was more than we expected. I highly recommend Ulungele for any of your tour needs while in South Africa.

Private tour of Hermanus and wine country. I HIGHLY recommend this company. Beginning with the first note I sent, Hank responded quickly and thoroughly, and listened to what I wanted. He was waiting for us at the airport to take us to our hotel, which was very comforting. We didn't have time to do a separate wine tasting tour and whale watching tour, so we opted for a private "wine and whales" tour, with Noel as our guide/driver. Noel was fabulous - my friend and I had endless questions and Noel was very receptive. He gave us so much information about life in South Africa, including personal stories which made it all real. While we didn't see a single whale (during peak whale watching season), we thoroughly enjoyed our day because Noel took us to so many beautiful spots, making any stops we wanted and letting us decide how long we wanted to stay. The last stop was at a winery with 7 tastings, so we were happy to have a driver we trusted take us back our hotel while we rested :).

GREAT COMPANY!! Highly Recommend!!!. We arranged this company for Airport transfers and the day tour to Inverdoorn Safari Park. The airport transfers were great! Value for money, efficient and very friendly! The Safari day tour - we got picked up early doors by Hank, who was so knowledgeable and friendly. We had an amazing trip to the safari, stopping on the way for breakfast at a Toll House, which was fantastic! gorgeous food with a brilliant view. We then continued on our travel, stopped to rescue a tortoise in-between! it was fab!. The safari was very intimate and only a few people in the car - it was a great day, with a nice lunch too. The tour in all was very informative and you could tell Hank was very passionate about his job! Thank you for all you shared about your county and the fab day out we had! Thank you!!

Look no further than Ulungele Tours. Well where to start. These guys are top notch. The service they offer is 2nd to none. They arranged Airport pick up and delivery back to the Airport. The service they offer has a personal touch that makes it that much better. Hank was amazing, we went to Inverdoorn Game reserve and Hank was so informative all the way there and sat down and had breakfast with us, we chatted and again this just added such a personal touch to the whole experience. I cannot praise them enough and when I return to South Africa I will look no further than Ulungele Tours to arrange all my activities. Thanks so much for making our holiday that much better. Matt Veness (the snoring guy in the back)

BEST TOUR COMPANY!. I don't even have words. I am so so so glad I booked with Ulungele! I recommended them to my friends also traveling around the same time and they were pleased as well. We booked the Safari and Best of Cape Tours with our friends! We were also booked for transfers to and from the airport (which has offered to us as a freebie for booking several tours and transfers), and to and from V&A for our Robben Island tours. We got to experience excellent service from three drivers: Gerald (who was our main driver as he accompanied us for the actual tours we got), Noel, and Hank himself. They were not just great drivers, but great company as well. ALSO, their prices are reasonable!! When we go back to Cape Town, we will definitely book with them again! Excellent customer service, very knowledgeable, very warm and polite people! Make sure to book Ulungele on your trip to Cape Town!

Best Tours ever. We had our Day Trip Safari + Best of the Cape Tour. The Day Trip Safari was soo much fun! especially our driver/tour guide, Noel is very good. He knows a lot of interesting facts regarding the places we're passing through. My husband loves history and so we enjoyed so much our conversation with Noel! :) And while we are talking about Nelson Mandela, he made some adjustments and allowed us to have a quick photo with the Freedom Walk monument before going straight to Inverdoorn! :) Thank you so much! The Safari trip in Inverdoorn is soo much fun as well! we were able to see awesome animals close enough to take photos and videos! :) The Next day, we did the The Best of Cape Tour. It was soo awesome as well, went around the Peninsula, Cape Of Good hope and lots of awesome places. Wine tasting is awesome too! we were able to went see Ostrich and had a chance to feed them! :) And again, while on the road, Noel had so much interesting stories to tell about history and some personal stories he experienced during Apartheid. We feel so comfortable with Noel and he's just so very nice! :)During planning, Hank was very quick to reply, He made sure I have enough information in planning the best tours in Cape Town. He is so nice as well and very accommodating! :) Thank you Hank! :)

Fabulous. I contacted Hank and made all our arrangements (with tweaks) and paid via paypal prior to our trip. Hank met us (family of 4) at the airport and gave us a brief introduction to Cape Town before dropping us off at the apartment. We were under the care of Garret for our 3 excursions and I could not have wished for a better guide. Garret was always prompt, informative and very curteous. What was particularly appreciated was his initiative to look ahead to the days plans to make sure restaurants and experiences were booked so no time was wasted. We enjoyed listening to stories about his country and went back to the apartment, really looking forward to the next outing. I would not hesitate in contacting Ulungele Tours again and wish Hank and his team all the best. You absolutely made our trip to Cape Town so memorable.

Flexible, reliable and friendly. We used Ulungele Tours for two private day trips out of Cape Town, and for our airport transfer. Although it seems Hank doesn't do much of the guiding/ driving anymore, we had no issues with our driver/ guide Garret, who was very friendly and knowledgeable, and only too happy to tailor the day to suit our interests. He arrived punctually both days, and put in more than a full day with us by the time we got back. We spent one day heading towards Cape Point, and another to Hermanus. Both days were excellent, and we really didn't pay very much more for a private tour for the two of us, than we would have done if we'd joined a group. However the flexibility of a private tour was great.

Cape Town Driver and Guided Tour. If you are looking for a driver and tour-guide while in Cape Town, I highly recommend Ulungele Tours based upon my experience with Hank and Noel. I wanted a driver to take my wife and I and our friends around Cape Town and South Africa and had no one but TripAdvisor subscribers to turn to. Posting on a TripAdvisor Forum to ask for recommendations for drivers in Cape Town, Hank Daries of Ulungele Tours answered with suggestions and a very appropriate plug for his business. After multiple exchanges with Hank, he customized an agenda and developed a price that was extremely competitive and covered all the sites and things we wanted to see.Having taken a leap of faith based upon the interactions with Hank, everything went like clockwork and went flawlessly.Noel was our driver and guide for the week and made the trip so much richer because of his local knowledge and his personal experience growing up in South Africa. He provided insights to political and cultural aspects of the country and we felt like we knew so much more for having Noel as our driver. He took us to the “local” places and was patient as we stopped frequently to take stunning pictures.We used Cape Town as our base and took day trips that included a tour of Cape Town, trip to the South African wine country, a day to the Cape of Good Hope, and a visit to Cape Agulhaus. Noel had spots along the way for us to see and an appropriate commentary for the locale and history.This was the trip of a lifetime and was so much more enjoyable because of Noel’s insight and care for his guests. I cannot overstate how great Ulugele Tours and Hank and Noel were.

Well Planned Extensive multi day tour. I plan down to the detail. I had a very good idea of all that I wanted to see and do in Cape Town, and sent my "requests" along to Hank.My family of four needed a multi-day guided trip, including airport transfers. Hank replied promptly - with an even more detailed tour suggestion by day than I could even think of.Over the few weeks before we arrive, Hank and I tweaked the schedule, including must sees and Hank arranged the sites and events so thy made best use of our visit.I found his fees to be very reasonable, and made one single payment via paypal BEFORE I left for vacation. No need to carry cash or worry about bank card safety.When we finally met Hank - I was as if a dear friend planned to take us on our tour. But a very knowledgeable, education and savvy friend. Hank shared with us history of Cape Town, current and past in addition to the sites and wonders we saw. We even convinced him to join us on a segway tour through the vineyards (He loved it.)I cannot say enough wonderful things about Hank. I wish every tour guide I hired were as thoughtful, thorough, detail oriented, fun and kind.Our family Highly recommeds!!

LIke having family or a trusted friend awaiting your arrival !. The driver was timely, courteous and competent. This was a great relief following a 15 hour flight. He provided excellent driving service,knew exactly where we needed to go, and pointed out things that helped us get familiar with the city we were visiting.

Airport Transfer . I was looking for transfers when I came across Hank on Trip Advisor. My email enquiry was dealt with without delay with a price for return transfers half that quoted by the Hotel. Hank was there ready and waiting at the pre-agreed times in clean and update vehicles. Hank was both friendly and knowledgeable giving us some great tips and suggestions for our stay in CT. When we return to CT I will not hesitate to contact Hank again, not only for the transfers, but also for some sightseeing tours. You can have full confidence in using Hank.

Awesome Cape Town!. Our guide Hank was highly recommended by neighbors here in Texas--and he did not disappoint! He was friendly, knowledgeable and always on time. We enjoyed Hanks' company and will contact him again if we have the good fortune to be able to return to South Africa.

Highly recommendable Day Tours in and outside Cape Town. We travelled with my family (two adults and two children aged six and nine) to Cape Town in February this year and had been recommended Hank and the Ulungele Tours by my relatives. What a fantastic day tours we had with Hank and Noel! They helped us from the very beginning by planning a realistic and family friendly program for us and took into consideration all of our wishes. We experienced several tours with them: a Safari tour, a Wine tour and a tour to Cape of Good Hope. Even when we wanted to change our schedule in the middle of our trip, they manage to re-schedule according to our wishes. Both Hank and Noel are excellent guides and drivers and we have a lot of long and interesting conversations in the car with them, discussing everything from politics to everyday life matters. Love them! I will definitely book their services again if possible!

Don't bother booking with the other guys. From the very first encounter I knew I was in good hands with Ulungele Tours. Hank is simply the best. He is extremely punctuational, knowledgeable, organized and professional. I used his services in July 2016 for a Day Tour of a Game Reserve Safari. I emailed him in May to book and he promptly answered the email in less than 24 hours. This was really reassuring since this was my first time traveling to South Africa, but I was also traveling solo. He picked us up right on time at 7am and drove 2.5hr to Inverdoorn Game Reserve. I was really happy to book this tour because it's not as crowded as the other one and you're only in a car of 12 people max. July is their winter so it was pretty cold especially with the open car concept. I wish I brought my ski mask. The safari part was amazing, since it's a game reserve the guides know exactly how many animals there are and you're kind of guaranteed to see all of them. I thought the tour was just the right amount of time because I was starting to shiver and was getting hungry. The lunch buffet was fantastic. Overall a memorable day. And honestly having Hank as our guide to the game reserve was fantastic. I learned so much about the history of South Africa. He is so eloquent in the way he speaks that I could've listened to him for hours. You will not be disappointed by booking through his company. He genuinely cares and strives to be

Book with them!. What a great experience! My wife and I pre-booked two one-day tours only a few days before our arrival, based on reviews we had seen on TripAdvisor. Hank was in contact with us almost immediately to answer all of our questions. No pressure whatsoever - just a sincere interest in having us make the most of our time. Upon arrival at the Cape Town airport, our guide, Noel, met us for transport to where we stayed in downtown Cape Town, and that set the tone for the next couple of days. Laid back, genuinely friendly, and totally tuned in to our needs, he made us easily feel welcome and comfortable. Arriving early to pick us up the next morning, the first day was a tour to Cape Point with a number of stops along the way, and Noel shared with us his vast knowledge and experience from which we learned an incredible amount about the history, culture, geography, etc., of the region. It felt like the equivalent of a college course on wheels - fantastic! Noel was also extremely flexible, catering to our interests and learning from us, as well. The second day was spent in the wine region, and, after we shared with Noel a particular winery we wanted to visit, he made a point of looking for a similar winery the night before so we had two that met our needs. His selection of restaurants was outstanding and he freely gave us suggestions on other things to do and sights to see on our own. In short, we left Cape Town with an appreciation of the region (and of South Africa, in general) we would not otherwise have had and with a new friend. I can't say enough good things about Noel.We also had the pleasure to meet Hank, who picked us up for our return to the airport and who was equally friendly and helpful. I'm sorry we didn't get to know him better, but I'll let the previous reviews speak to his great nature. I highly recommend Ulungele Tours!

Airport transfer. I contacted Hank by email and booked for him to collect us from Cape Town airport and to do a return journey at the end of the holiday. Hank was very friendly and informative and gave us some welcome safety tips as we were hiring a car later in our holiday. It was good to have him waiting on our arrival after a long flight. His van was very clean, tidy and roomy. I would definitely book Hank again.

Absolutely perfect. I went to Cape Town as a solo female traveller so naturally was very concerned about safety and struck gold when I came across Ulungele Tours and Hank to pick me up and drop me back at the airport to city centre. Hank made me feel so safe, so warm and welcoming, and didn't mind spending time telling me all about the local area, people, way of life etc which made my journeys so enjoyable.He was so easy to book with, perfectly timed with arrivals and drop offs and all in would recommend to anyone. I've also heard great things about the tours he does too - win win all round. Thank you Hank!

A Day of Fun and Laughter. We had booked with Ulungele Tours for our pick up from the airport, a Best of Cape Town Tour and then a drop off at the train station.Everyone was prompt and we felt well cared for. Our day tour was amazing with probably one of the best guides we have had in all our tours. Noel George - you were amazing with a great sense of humour and depth of knowledge. We had an amazing day. The great thing about booking a tour with Ulungele is that they cater to what you want to do - it's not set in concrete and it's private so you can do things in your time not someone else. The day tour takes you all around the Peninsula and the views are breathtaking. I am so pleased we booked this tour as we had a very short time in Cape Town and got to see everything. Hank the owner also provided guidance of the best options to see Table Mountain and Robbin Island without using guides - his advice was invaluable and we had not problems getting to see these. Booking was a breeze with prompt responses to my queries. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend Ulungele Tours to other travelers.

Wine testing & Safari. I have hired Hank for 2 full days to take us to Wine tasting tours and some safari close to capetown.The experience with him was excellent. He informed me upfront of a lot of places that i could choose. Also recommended me good restaurants to go in Caper town.He drove my friend and me to the winelands and explained every bit of the places and took us to a fantastic restaurant.Is a great guide and i would recommend him to anyone that wishsed to visit Southafrica

Transfer from Game Reserve. This man, Hank Daries, is incredible. We had a very difficult situation involving a wrecked car and we were stranded at the game reserve we went to. We called Hank, who left immediately to pick us up and drive us back to Capetown for a reasonable fee.The trip itself was very enjoyable. Hank is incredibly knowledgeable about all things South Africa and answered a slew of questions that I had about tourism, the country itself, etc. He also obliged to stop at a mini mart so we could grab something to eat. On top of this, once we got back to Capetown he helped us file a report on the wrecked car - a process that undoubtedly would have been more difficult without his assistance. All in all he helped turn a very stressful situation into a pleasant return. Thank you Hank!

Awesome experience that was made special. We were a group of 5 traveling to Cape Town/Garden Route, and we were planning on renting a car and driving ourselves; we had already made the hotel bookings months in advance. A few weeks prior to our trip, one of the folks in my group suggested finding a guide who can drive us around since it was going to be a short trip and we wanted to be able to maximize our time. I was skeptical that she would be able to find someone flexible enough to fit our schedule (we had the dates of when we needed to be in certain areas because of our hotel bookings) - but luckily, she found Ulungele Tours. Hank was quick to respond, which we appreciated. His company was able to accommodate our schedule/we weren't stuck with the off-the-shelf tours out there.However, I was still worried that it was too good to be true - i.e., we would have someone that just drives us around/not really act as a guide. Well, Hank turned out to be highly knowledgeable and was also very anxious to show us his country. Even when the rest of the group was feeling lazy/had no idea of where to go, Hank was still full of energy and wanted to make sure we saw the important sights (which we were thankful for). We actually considered it one of our best vacations EVER because of the experience. Note that this isn't your cookie-cutter tour; it's for folks that want something more intimate and personalized, with a guide that you can (and will want to!) hang out with.

Would not change a thing :). A most memorable 7-day Cape Town and Garden Route experience with 4 friends, booking was a breeze, did everything we could possibly do from the best views and cuisine in and around CT, to great white shark cage-diving in Gansbaai, wine-tasting in Stellenbosch and Franschhoek, mini-safari in Outdtshoorn, nerve-wracking winding drive through Swartbergpas (felt safe the whole time though), walk with lions and elephant sanctuary in Knysna, and the highest bungy jumping bridge in the world, all would not have been as much fun or even possible without Hank and his crew at the helm. We would not change a thing, especially our choice of probably the best tour company in the whole of Southern Africa. Thank you :)

Simply Put: Ulungele Tours is INCREDIBLE and Hank is the BEST!. My friend Brian and I had the pleasure to go out with Hank for a safari tour this past friday. Hank, the tour guide, was extremely friendly and knowledgeable, and the accommodations were spectacular; Prompt, clean and excellent all around. We were so impressed we decided to go out on a private tour the following day, and we are so glad we did! Our initial plan was to see Boulders Beach, where the penguins are, but Hank convinced us to check out Camp Hope and Cape Point; two fantastic highlights if you enjoy spectacular views and a nice, mild hike. Hank is a fantastic tour guide; he gives you your freedom, but also is ready to answer any question with a smile. IF YOU VISIT CAPE TOWN, DO A ULUNGELE TOUR!!!

THE BEST!!! 5stars all the way. Had a fantastic experience with Ulungele Tours. Both Noel and Hank were very knowledgeable and friendly.The trips are reasonably priced too. The car and van during our tours was in very good condition. They were always on time for the tours and transfers and were very accommodating with our requests. They are responsible for us having a wonderful time around the western cape. Give Ulungele tours a shot ,u will not be disappointed. Highly recommended.

SEEING SOUTH AFRICA WITH THE BEST. Recently I accidentally stumbled upon the website of the highly rated Ulungele tours. After much research, I booked CapeTown airport pickup and tours on the southern garden route to Port Elizabeth and back to Cape Town, on the northern route through the ostrich farms and wine country. For the entire trip, we were guided by the knowledgeable owner, Hank Daries, who is a most helpful professional, He is nice, polite, and an excellent driver who is a lot of fun. The trip was personalized, comfortable, and pleasant. i have absolutely nothing negative to say about our experience. Would I book with Ulungele again, you ask? Indeed, I would and will as we are returning to South Africa in March of 2017, and will need four airport transfers. Ulungele's is by far the smoothest part of any trip we have made in a long time. Hank is very dependable and a joy to be around: I can't possibly be more positive. See you in March Hank! Magi Aldridge, Breckenridge, Colorado, USA.

Had a great day traveling around with Hank. We normally hire a guide for at least a day trip every place we visit. Hank was an excellent guide for our Cape Town trip. We started our tour in Cape Town. When we got in the van he passed out books and maps for everyone. As we drove south, Hank pointed out sites and also provided some history. The first big stop was Boulder Beach to see some penguins. From there, we headed to the Cape of Good Hope. During the time driving, Hank told us about the areas, buildings and other points of interest along with history and current events. Hank consistently invited questions which we all had. After we spent time at the light house, we had lunch as the Two Oceans restaurant at the Cape. Then we headed back north to wine country stopping for wine tasting. It was a very good day with Hank.

A Cape Peninsular day tour – informative, well worth the money and Hank was a brilliant guide.. Collection and drop-off was from our accommodation. Hank was our very knowledgeable guide and driver who gave us a welcome and easily digestible commentary on the flora, fauna and history of the picturesque regions and towns we passed through on our clockwise peninsular tour (Muizenberg - Fish Hoek - Simon’s Town - Boulders Beach, with its resident African penguins (optional extra charge)- Cape of Good Hope Nature Reserve (mandatory extra charge) - Cape Point – Chapman’s Peak - Hout Bay – Camps Bay. Hank thoughtfully scheduled in leisure time at many of these locations for photo opportunities and restroom breaks. He very kindly booked a table for lunch at Cape Point’s ‘Two Oceans’ restaurant. The food was not expensive and of very good quality; the view was magnificent. To work up a sharp appetite we first climbed up and around the promontory to see the two Cape Point Light Houses (there is a funicular for an extra charge). Despite the wind, the walk is well worth the effort.

Great tour and lots of information provided. Hank went out of his way to make sure we had a great time. He picked us (4 adults) up from the airport and during the trip to Cape Town gave us a history tour, as well as the do's and don't for the area. He took us on a trip around Cape Peninsular as well as arranging for a day safari to see the big 5. He is very friendly and we felt completely safe and secure with him.

Wonderful Day Safari From Cape Town. It was a wonderful surprise when we learned we could do a day safari within the Cape Town region. We heard back from Hank right away. Great communication. Not a minute late. Learned a great deal on the drive about the current Cape Town climate. The most honest guide we had for our entire trip. Saw elephants, zebras, rhinos, lions, cheetahs and a host of other animals on a gigantic reserve. Made it back in time for dinner. Highly recommended.

Awesome week!. When looking into visiting Cape Town, we decided to do all of our tours through Hank because of his raving reviews and variety of tours. We did the Cape Tour, shark diving, wine tour, safari, and airport transport with Noel. He was an excellent tour guide--always on time and easy to create a friendship with within hours. We had inside jokes right after our first day together. We are so happy that we were able to spend the entire week with Noel--booking through one company was a decision we were very happy with.We feel that we left South Africa with a better understanding of the culture, history, and politics thanks to Noel. We would have never gotten such an informative experience booking tours through companies that have larger groups.We highly recommend booking through Ulungele--if the amount of 5-star reviews won't convince you, I'm not sure what will!Thank you Noel and Hank for the awesome experience. Hope to be back soon!

A perfect day!. We had the pleasure of spending the day with Hank. He picked us up from our hotel, and we did the Cape Peninsula tour. We had many scenic and interesting stops, and a delicious lunch. My only regret is that there aren't more hours in the day!Hank's vehicle was clean, comfortable, and well cared for. as for Hank, he was kind and funny. He has knowledge on a wide array of subjects, and he truly made our tour a great one. I can not say enough positive things!Should we be lucky enough to return to the area, Ulungele will be our first and only choice! Thank you, Hank!

Unforgettable experience with Ulungele Tours. We emailed Hank a couple of months before our trip to Cape Town in February and asked him if he could put an itinerary together for us so we could see as much of the Cape area as possible over two separate full days and also arrange for us to visit Inverdoorn. Well he certainly didn't disappoint as we didn't think it was possible to see such much but yet not feel at all rushed. Noel was our driver/ guide for the two days and he was brilliant - we learned so much about the Cape and South Africa and we would never have seen so much if we'd hired a car.Hank took us for the overnight trip to Inverdoorn, which was absolutely wonderful and we would wholeheartedly recommend it to anybody. We really enjoyed our trip with Hank and we saw much more of the Cape on the journey. He is a lovely person and loves to share his knowledge of the area and the country with you.We enjoyed the time with both Noel and Hank so much we have asked Hank to put a two week itinerary together for us for next February along the Garden Route.

Superb service!. Hank and his team are just great. We used Ulungele for airport transfers and for touring around the Western Cape Area. Noel, our guide, was an excellent driver, story teller and historian - he really brought South African history - both positive and negative - to life and showed us amazing sights. We were able to arrange our daily tours to fit what we wanted to see, including days trips to Hermanus, the Cape of Good Hope, Stellenbosch and Constantia. We especially recommend visiting the Botanical Gardens, the Boulders Park (penguins!), the Aquarium, Robben Island and Glen Carlou vineyards. Thank you to Ulungele for really making our visit special!

A Once in a Lifetime Experience. My husband and I booked our entire honeymoon in South Africa through Hank, he made the experience exceptional and the logistics seamless. We highly recommend Hank for anyone planning an extended stay in the Cape Region - he was able to help us shape our trip to meet our needs! We did several day trips - Cape Point, Cape Agulhas, Shark Cage Diving, Table Mountain, and extended experiences - 2 day Safari at Inverdoorn and 3 nights in wine country. The beauty of working with Hank is that you always get a custom experience, where your comfort is top of mind. We couldn't have had a better time! The personal touches and constant communication over our tip made for an exceptional honeymoon! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED! Thank you Hank!

Simply outstanding 'Best of the Cape tour'. We booked the Best of the Cape tour with Ulungele tours. We had limited time in the Cape, so this tour seemed perfect Cape point; penguins; SimonsTown; Stellenbosch and more... sound exhausting? Well the answer was no, the tour was nothing short of outstanding, ralalaxing and thoroughly informative. Our guide Hank was very knowledgeable, humourous and totally professional. I would highly recommend this tour to all ages as both myself; husband and teenage children all absolutely loved the experience. Thank you Hank for providing us with such wonderful memories of Capetown

Memorable Cape Experience. Hank is simply brilliant! He is an amazing and safe driver, great coordinator and extremely knowledgeable about the Southern Cape Region that we toured with him. We were on our honeymoon in Cape Town and toured the city, garden route and inverdoorn safari with Hank. It was a pleasure to have his company and knowledge at our disposal. He was keen to show us around, try different routes and also exchange talks on every topics. I strongly recommend using his expertise to plan your tour around the Cape Region so that you enjoy this region to its best. The cherry on the cake was the amazing rainbow we got to see after taking a different route through the Swartberg Pass on Hanks suggestion.Thank you Hank!!

A memorable day out to Cape Point. My sister and I booked a Best of the Cape day trip with Hank on 19/11/2015 during a short trip to Cape Town. Hank was prompt, courteous, attentive to our preferences for the day and a perfect gentleman from beginning to end. He was a pleasure to listen to as he described both the places of interest and the history of South Africa. He provides a very professional service in a spotlessly clean vehicle and we enjoyed our day thoroughly. We met as strangers and I felt like we parted as friends. I would highly recommend and wish him every success for the future.

Great for to-and-from the airport. I've made use of Ulungele Tours on several occasions for going to the airport and being picked up, and have never been disappointed. Even at odd times - early morning and late at night, everything has been very smooth.They are on time, friendly and helpful. Highly recommended for when you want reliable transfers to the airport.

4 days garden route tour. Excellent tour company, our guide bruce is really knowledgeble, and tour is well planed. Also we get the free airport transfer and free meal for the last night of the tour. So I definitly recommend this tour company.

Excellent Service. We booked Hank to pick us up at the airport, he was waiting for us and it was easy to find him and he also phoned the accommodation we were staying at to let them know what time we would arrive. There were 6 in our party and we took a day tour down to the Cape with him also. The trip was amazing visiting all the sights. Hank was very informative and we had a really great day out with him. We were due to be back at the accommodation at 5.30 but we were stuck in a traffic jam so we took a detour to the Rhodes memorial and had afternoon tea so arrived back later but this was no issue to Hank at all. We all had a great time and would recommend Hanks tours.

2-day tour to Inverdoorn. On Saturday morning, November 28, 2015, Hank Daries of Ulungele Tours met us at 9:00 a.m. at the waterfront in Cape Town where our cruise ship was docked and drove us to the Inverdoorn resort where we spent the night. Hank thoughtfully drove us via one route (N1 highway and over Bains Kloof Mountain Pass) and returned us to the ship the next day by a slightly different route. With Hank’s commentary, we delighted in the drive through the mountains, villages, wine country, and desert area. At Inverdoorn we enjoyed two game drives with a diversity of animals in the Reserve—one in the late afternoon and one early the next morning. The “Cheetah Encounter” late morning was quite remarkable. Two young women guides at the resort, Seonaid and Mariske, were very kind and helped us identify a number of birds both around the resort and on the game drives. The accommodations and food were five star. Hank Daries was an excellent guide—courteous, friendly, knowledgeable, and punctual. Arrangements for the excursion were easy, and email communications very prompt. We highly recommend this Ulungele tour to anyone visiting Cape Town. It was the highlight of our trip.

Fantastic Service!. I cannot say enough about Hank's amazing service both before our arrival and upon meeting him at the airport. We arrived early in the morning to join a cruise ship at the port with an afternoon check in and Hank worked with us to prepare a strategy in advance to store our luggage and deliver it to us later at the port. While in the end we were able to drop the luggage at the ship early, it was a great relief to have an alternative plan so that we could enjoy the day (and our scheduled trip to Robben Island). Hank was incredibly responsive from the first inquiry (which I believe he responded to within two minutes) until our scheduled arrival. He is extremely knowledgeable, professional and a pleasure to be around. I wished I had booked a day tour with him as well and I will certainly do so if I return to Cape Town. In the meantime, I highly recommend him to friends, family, and TripAdvisor users. Many thanks, Hank!

A Wonderful Way to Intimately Experience The Cape. We wanted to see Cape Point without being part of a large tour group and so used Hank for a private tour. Our liaisons via email to book the tour were easy and Hank didn't require any payment until the day of our tour. He was professional, polite and definitely knows his stuff. He shared a wealth of information throughout the drive about the various places we went as well as South African history in general. Always offered to take our pictures and recommended places to see and do for the remainder of our holiday. I would book with Hank without hesitation!

Hank is a great guy, super professional, and knows his stuff!. I went to Western Cape in May of 2015 with my brothers and cousins. Initially we hired Hank simply to take us to an Safari park. Right before we flew to South Africa, Hank mentioned he was going to be near the Cape Town airport right about the time we were to land. He offered to pick us up and drive us to hotel in the center of Cape Town. In just a few minutes upon getting in his van, we were already impressed with him and decided to not just do the safari drive with him, but also a wine tour and Shark diving. Later we decided to also have him take us to Cape of Good Hope.He always picked us up on time and every place he took us to was impressive. Hank is from Western Cape and speaks fluent English and Afrikaans. He gave us a extensive overview of South African history and culture. So not only was touring with him fun, but also very educational.While the roads overall are decent in South Africa, there are some tight spots on some rights right along the coast. I think it is best to leave it so someone like Hank to do the driving and you just go and enjoy the view.If I go to Western Cape again (I want to!!), I definitely would book with Hank in a heartbeat!

Hank Is Wonderful !. We used Ulungele Tours for our airport transfers and two day trips while in Cape Town. Hank was professional, knowledgeable, flexible and a good person to spend time with. He is fluent in English, a safe driver, experienced guide and really cares about his homeland and bio-diversity of the region.On both the inward and outward transfers, we had to make last minute changes due to the airlines, and Hank responded to our needs and was flexible with his schedule.When we finally arrived in Cape Town, Hank was waiting for us with a personalized sign.On the first day we did the Wine Lands Tour and on the second day the Cape Peninsula Tour. Both days were wonderful and we are happy we made the decision to use Hank. He provided a lot of interesting and useful information about Cape Town and the attractions/places we visited. His vehicle is clean, relatively new, and is comfortable to ride in. In addition to the key attractions, we made several stops where Hank gave us additional information about the history and background of the area, including the Drakenstein Correction Center, Afrikaans Language Monument, Franschoek and Stellenbosch. During the Wind Lands tour we visited four wineries, of which Laborie and Spier were our top two. Each morning Hank was waiting for us when we came out of the hotel.On the Peninsula Tour, I would skip the Ostrich Farm and Seal Island boat tour, unless this would be the first time each activity. If you have done these before, it offers nothing new. I recommend you spend the time at Cape Point, Cape Hopeand/or the Cape Point Light House.On the Wine Land tour just have a good time. The wine is very good and thankfully Hank was doing the driving.

Great day at Inverdoorn with Hank. We were a group of five people that took a day tour to Inverdoorn with Hank. He made sure that we had the best experience possible, giving us great advice and info about the place. He was willing and able to answer just about any question we had about South Africa in general and the specific places we went to. Very nice host.

Hank is a first class operator, very knowledgable and very professional, he is HIGHLY recommended :-). Hank put together a 4 day trip for me and my family that took us as far away as Hermanus for the whales, and Cape Point Simons town, false bay, Hout Bay, Table Mountain, signal hill, V&A Docks ! you name it around the Cape town Hank took us there :-) Great vehicles too modern, safe, spacious and great local knowledge we will be dealing with Hank again for sure :-)

Hank + the Garden Route = Perfect!. My husband and I recently had the pleasure of experiencing the Garden Route with Hank as our guide. It was by far, one of the best touring experiences we have had! Hank managed to fit in every activity we requested plus threw in a few things he thought we would like (and he was right!). Our days were jammed packed (at our request), but it never felt busy. Even the long drives seemed to go fast! Hank knew SO much about the area, the history, the culture - my husband and I learned so much more than we ever thought we would on a tour. We really can't say enough about Hank. We were a bit concerned prior to meeting Hank - we were about to spend 4 days with someone we did not know, who knows if our personalities would mesh, etc. But we trusted all the Trip Advisor reviews and we are so glad we did! Hank was so incredibly easy to get along with and we really were sad to have to say goodbye!

Wonderful trip with Hank!. Hank took care of us for 3 days: Cape Peninsula tour, transfer to Franschhoek, Shark Cage Diving and whale watching. Just like all the positive reviews here, we were very happy to have gone with Hank during our stay in Cape Town. Hank is not only professional and knowledgeable, he is also very flexible (if we want to change our schedule etc) and very fun to be with. His car was also very comfortable so no worries if the drive will be long. Thank you Hank for taking care of us and hope to visit your beautiful country again.

Best of Cape Town Tour. We had a wonderful day with Hank on the Best of Cape Town full day tour. It was not only great to see the beautiful city and surroundings, but to hear about the history and background on the area. Hank was so fun to be with and we were most grateful for his knowledge and kind manner. Can't be beat, in my opinion!

Fantastic Penninsula/Winelands tour. Hank's professionalism, knowledge, courtesy and flawless execution made our tour outstanding. As if that's not enough, he's got a personality that makes him fun to be with. No reason to look elsewhere. Highly recommend.

Absolutely Brilliant Garden Route Tour with Hank & Ulungele Tours. I recently booked the personal 3 Night/4 Day Garden Route Tour with Hank Daries and Ulungele Tours for friends from Canada. Having been through dozens of reviews, I settled on Ulungele Tours and was not disappointed at all. Hank’s knowledge of the Garden Route itself (he was born raised there) is phenomenal. He really makes every effort to explain the history behind each little town and the entire drive is a big classroom! For a first time visitor to South Africa, that is crucial.Hank is brilliant at communicating and you can send him dozens of mails until you are happy -- he will make excellent and knowledgeable suggestions and will tailor your trip to what you want. The accommodation and sights on the Garden Route were also fantastic. These may be the same that other operators use but again – Hank gives each site visit all he can – loads of information.Another great thing is that he is very very patient and really looks after his clients. He is really concerned that he is able to fit as much as possible into a day without it being ‘ too much.’ For elderly people this is a big bonus.He did the airport pick up and drop off and what every other reviewer has sais is so true --- 100% punctual. In fact, each time, he arrived earlier than expected.If you are planning a tour of the Western Cape and you want to take in any of the sights from Table Mountain to Cape Point to the Garden Route, Hank should be your number 1 choice. Absolutely no regrets!

Hank's Attention to Detail When Meeting Customer Needs!. I recently had an opportunity to go back to So. Africa for business. It was my first time visiting Cape Town and needed to maximize whatever free and very limited time I had in this gorgeous city! Hank is THE guy to customize a visit to see the best of Cape Town. He was very attentive to my needs and has done a phenomenal job showing me what I needed to see in Cape Town! I especially enjoyed spending my weekend at Inverdoorn since I'm such a big fan of animals! Inverdoorn is a great private wild park where on can see most if not all of Big 5! One of the many things I really appreciated about Hank is the fact that he showed up at all of our appointments ahead of time! Thank you Hank for the wonderful, fun and pain-free experience in Cape Town!

Inverdoorn and Shark Cage Dive. We booked a day safari to Inverdoorn and shark cage dive through Hank Daries and Ulungele Tours. Hank is a great guy to share some road time with and is very knowledgeable about the area he works in and the tours he offers. I would certainly book with him again and you should too. Thank you for everything Hank! Deryl

Incredible! -Inverdoorn with Hank. For our week-long holiday in Cape Town, I booked various tours recommended through Trip Advisor and this one was the absolute best because of Hank. The private drive from our hotel to the safari park and back was absolutely the way to go, and we were so fortunate to have someone like Hank be our guide. He made sure we got the best guide at the park and the best seats in the truck during the safari, as well as extra blankets because it was quite cold that day. He stopped along the way so we could take photos of the incredible scenery and was so knowledgable about South Africa and the area. It was such an enjoyable day. We have only been back in the US for 2 days and have already started to plan our return trip to Cape Town. When we do, there is no question that we will be booking most of our activities through Ulungele.

Well organised + excellent service for a great Chalet Overnight Safari. In July I visited South Africa for a business trip and I had a 5 days off in Cape Town. I wanted to do a 2 days safari-trip, but due to the winter season several other travel agent would not offer a solo trip. Ulungele Tours directly offered directly where I looking for, including a detailed description.The service of the trip was good, got nicely picked-up from my hotel en the drivers for the trip drove very safely. The safari in the GAME reserve was impressive and everything (Chalet, dinners, Game-drives) were organised perfectly. As an extra service Hank drove me from the city to the international airport. I can recommend Ulungele Tours.

Go with Hank!. A friend and I traveled to Cape Town for a quick 2 day visit in June 2015. Neither of us had been to Cape Town before and with our limited time, we wanted to try to fit in as much as possible. Hank was a huge help! He picked us up from the airport and helped plan our itinerary for the following 2 days, which included a full day tour of the Cape. He is extremely knowledgable, friendly, and he genuinely wants to make your experience memorable. Not only that, but his prices are definitely more reasonable than all other tour companies we looked into. I wouldn't hesitate to book with him and look forward to my next trip to the Cape!

Amazing Best of Cape & Garden Route. My boyfriend and I had a wonderful six days with Hank around the Cape Peninsula, Winelands, and Garden Route. Hank picked us up from the airport, then came back the next morning to pick us and my friend up for our Best of the Cape Tour. He adjusted the day to our interests. He was extremely friendly and knowledgeable. The next day he took my friend and I shark cage diving - it was quite an early morning, with Hank's safe driving, we were able to sleep comfortably the entire way there. For the next three days, Hank took me and my boyfriend on a Garden Route Tour, ending by dropping us off in Port Elizabeth. It was an amazing three days, we talked about every topic under the sun, from music to ethics and morals. Hank was a bit more expensive than other tour operators, but the second you start corresponding with him, you realize that it is worth it - he is responsive and answers all questions thoroughly. I am quite the traveler, so I had many itinerary options and was constantly double checking Hank's schedule - he was very patient with me and had everything under control - the six days went off without a hitch! Thank you so much Hank for the great trip, we had a wonderful time and we look forward to seeing you on our next trip to South Africa! Stay in touch and make sure you share your bungee jump video with us when you work up the courage to jump :)Katelyn & Matt

Mini Cape Peninsula Day Trip - Excellent Tour. We had a limited time between flights in Cape Town and wanted to see its highlights. Our plans were weather dependent and on the day we changed our plan from visiting Table Mountain to a more scenic tour of Simons Town, the Penguins, Signal Hill, city landmarks and dinner at the V&A Waterfront. Hank picked us up promptly from the airport and took us on a great tour. He was keen to understand our interests and adjusted the plans accordingly so that we got the most out of the experience. He was both passionate and knowledgeable about Cape Town and this came across in his engaging style.As we needed to catch our flight back to the UK that evening it was essential to get back to the airport on time. Hank timed this tour perfectly and we had no worries.We really enjoyed this tour with Hank and would recommend him Ulungele tours to anyone.

Wonderful Day with Hank. We arranged an airport pickup and a day tour of the Cape Peninsula with Ulungele Tours. The day tour was wonderful, Hank was incredibly accommodating when I asked to change our schedule the day prior to ensure we would be able to visit Table Mountain in the morning before the rest of our tour. Hank arrived early and was a wonderful guide, providing knowledgeable commentary throughout the day. I highly recommend working with Ulungele Tours to arrange all of your Cape Town plans.

Excellent Experience. Hank was a pleasure. He was punctual, knowledgeable, and fun. Hank spent 4 days with my group and our itinerary included shark diving, wine tasting, a safari, and checking out the Cape of Good Hope. It was fantastic and I give Hank my highest recommendation!

Ulungele Tours-Hank was amazing. Our group of 6 wanted to book an overnight safari - after looking at a number of reviews we settled on Hank/Ulungele Tours. This decision ended up making our trip to Cape Town just amazing. After we booked the safari, our group decided we wanted to go shark diving - and what do you know - Hank took care of that. We then decided to add on the Cape Peninsula tour - no problem - Hank handled. He also set us up with 2 wine tastings and provided transfer to and from the airport. As you can tell - Hank basically did it all and made our Cape Town visit amazing thanks to his flexibility and recommendations. He was always early and very courteous. As we had some long rides with Hank - we not only gained a tour guide but a historian about the African people and culture. Our group is still raving about our trip and how fortunate we were that we came across Hank and Ulungele Tours.
Great Service. We booked taxi for 3 days with Ulungele Tours and the service was very good.The driver had good knowledge about South Africa.The car was on time and rates are reasonable.

2 Day Safari Trip organised by Hank - FANTASTIC SERVICE!. My husband and I booked a 2 day safari experience at the Inverdoorn Game Reserve. Hank arranged everything for us; he picked us up from where we were staying in Somerset West, he booked the accommodation at Inverdoorn, he arranged our safari for us and he drove us back afterwards. Admittedly I have written a number of 'excellent' reviews on TripAdvisor however I think Hank deserves his own category for being outstanding! Booking with him was incredibly easy and he responded to our emails straight away, he sent pictures and a website link to the game reserve and he was able to answer any questions we had. We had a 2-3 hour journey to get to the game reserve and all the way there Hank offered us general advice on where to go and what to do in Cape Town, he also offered safety advice and warned us to be careful in some areas of the city, he told us about what to expect from our safari and where we should sit on the jeep to get the best experience, he talked about the history of the towns that we went through and pointed things out to us, he also allowed us to take pictures when we wanted to. We stopped on a mountain pass and he took a fantastic picture of us and at this point he also told us about all of the wild animals that used to be in area. Just over half way through the trip we stopped in Ceres to get snacks (Hank suggested that this would be a good idea as we might not get another chance before we got to Inverdoorn). Hank was very kind and talked to the staff of the nearby Spur to see if I could use their 'facilities'! Unfortunately the public toilets in Ceres were out of order so I was very thankful that Hank offered to do this! When we arrived at the game reserve Hank once again did everything for us. He told us to take a seat outside on a comfortable sofa and wondered off to find someone to bring us our welcome drinks and go through a few things with us. Hank only left when we were checked in and being escorted to our chalet.The safari itself was absolutely fantastic and our chalet was perfect; Hank of course suggested that we should book the chalet and not the guesthouse as it was more appropriate for what we wanted out of the trip. I can't recommend Hank enough! He did absolutely everything for us and he just knew everything there was to know about Cape Town from what cars are most popular to what wine tours would be good to go on. Don't hesitate to book with him! THANK YOU HANK!

Cheetah Outreach Centre. We used Hank's company to transport us to the Cheetah Outreach Centre at Somerset West on the outskirts of Cape Town. The driver was very punctual and courteous and drove us very safely to/from the centre. We hope to visit Cape Town again next year and will definitely be getting in touch with Hank to take us on our tours!

Amazing experience in Cape Town. This is my first review on TripAdvisor and it’s dedicated to an extraordinary professional: Hank (Ulungele´s owner). My husband and me have “discovered” him consulting the TA reviews about Cape Town and we are absolutely sure that book our tours with this agency was a great decision. Hanks took care personally of our airport-hotel-airport transfer, hotel reservation, safari in the Inverdoorn Game Reserve and one day Cape Peninsula tour. Everything was perfect! Hank was always friendly, very informative and punctual. I was particularly quite impressed with his knowledge of history, economy, environment… We enjoyed travelling with him and wish to count on his help again in our next trip to South Africa. I highly recommend Ulungele Tours!

Amazing, Hank is world class!. We used Hank and company for an airport transfer from Cape Town and also on a day safari trip a few days later. I booked based on the great reviews on Tripadvisor. Hank is kind, funny and has a ton of knowledge. It was a great history lesson learning about all the landmarks, different cultures and languages in the region. If you're booking a tour in the Cape Town area, do yourself a big favor and book with Hank. You will not regret it.

Excellent tour to Cape of Good Hope and Cape Point. Hank was our private driver and guide for the day. He took us to a variety of stops and arranged the tour to avoid road delays and big tourist busses. He allowed us to make stops for photos and adjust our time to our preferences . Hank is very friendly, knowledgeable and accommodating. We very much enjoyed our day with him.

Excellent Service Yet Again!. We found this tour company a few years ago by sheer luck! My husband and I have been again to Cape Town and yet again Hank did not let us down! Only two of us but exceptional service and company from Hank who is used to dealing with individuals and large parties also with a comfortable and 'passionate' enthusiasm for his country. We have been his 'guinea pigs' for a couple of his trips especially in the wine route and rest assured we have enjoyed every moment! Hank is efficient, well mannered, trustworthy and is now a 'friend' that we think very highly of ! The trips we have covered have been well planned, value for money and Hank 'listens' if you want to alter anything and nothing appears to be too much trouble! We look forward to seeing you again Hank and Thank You for such a marvellous time once again! Best Wishes to you and Your Family! X

Black Swan Normanton Cape Town golf tour. Ulugele is a Zulu word which means everything will be alright, book anything with Hank Diaries and I can guarantee everything will be alright.I have recently returned from a 10 night stay in Cape Town with a party of 18, of which 16 were golfers. As one of the tour organisers I was responsible for the booking of accommodation, airport and golf transfers, golf bookings and excursions.While searching the web, by a massive stroke of luck I came upon Hank`s company. After many email exchanges trying to sort out all the details, it was apparent from the start, Hank was passionate about his company , country and most importantly for our group, his desire to iron out the smallest of details to minimise any problems for us. I could tell by email that Hank was a good guy.How wrong I was, he was far more than good, his punctuality, his knowledge (which gave us all a greater insight into the area from a geographical, history & social perspective) his Patience for an all male group of ages varying from 36 to 74, is far more than anything we expected or have experienced touring the world previously. The wine tour with lunch & trip to Cape Point were days we all will all remember. Hank and Gerard (his father in law), lunching with us on both days. While on the visit to Cape Point one of our party became very unwell, and with his usual calmness, Hank organised his return to Cape Town so the rest of the party could carry on with the rest of the day. All golf days went without a hitch and Hank & Gerard waited patiently while we had after game drinks. As is usual on our trips we have a presentation dinner at the end of the week and all the party were pleased that Hank & Gerard accepted our invitation to join us, such was the bonding of the group and these 2 fine men. As I said previously book this company, they will exceed your expectations A party of 18 came to Africa for a golf trip, but left, with making 2 very good friends.Thanks again Hank for making our holiday truly memorable.Frank

Hank is the epitome of Cape Town friendliness. WOW! I have been on many tours on different continents and Hank ranks as one of the all-time best tour guides. On March 15 2015, I joined Hank on a one-day tour to Inverdoorn. Prompt (and friendly at 6:30AM), I enjoyed great conversation with Hank for the next three hours to Inverdoorn. Hank also gave great tips for the safari.Hank responded easily to the needs of the group. He provided great information on South Africa, Cape Town and life in general.Thank you for an awesome day Hank!

ABSOLUTELY OUTSTANDING. I have recently returned from a ten night, eighteen strong, golfing tour of the Cape Town district which utilised a hotel in Camps Bay as a base. The tour was prepared in negotiation, not by me I would add, with Hank the owner and managing director of Ulungele Tours in advance of the visit and the whole experience was absolutely first class, indeed faultless.We were greeted at the airport by Hank, a very easy going and personable individual, who transported our party to Camps Bay in two mini buses with trailers to accommodate the luggage and golf clubs. For the next ten days which included five days of golf most of which involved travel of between one and two hours nothing was too much trouble for Hank and his co-driver, his father-in-law Gerard. Collection was punctual on every occasion and no time pressures were ever encountered in respect of the return journey leaving complete flexibility for drinks and refreshments at the conclusion of the golf. The handling of sixteen sets of clubs daily was arranged by Hank on some occasions after being cleaned by the golf club staff. All we had to do was identify the bags and relax at the facilities.On two of the non-golf days we enjoyed two full day tours to both Cape Point and the Paarl/Franschhoek/Stellenbosch area taking in three wine tasting experiences at the respective estates, in addition to a superb lunch in Franschhoek. One example of the excellent approach to service can be described when one of our party was taken ill en-route to Cape Point which presented difficulties for the day tour itself. Hank was able to arrange a medical evacuation by recruiting a colleague from Cape Town to perform a repatriation trip by driving to Simon’s Town and return with the incapacitated party whilst the remainder of the group continued to the Cape. There was of course a fee involved which in all the attendant circumstances I thought was very reasonable.As I have indicated previously nothing was too much trouble for Hank or any of his assistants who assisted in making a most memorable touring experience and I have absolutely no hesitation in recommending this company to any reader.

Lions and cheetahs and zebras, oh my!. Had a wonderful 2 day safari experience at Inverdorn and the Western Cape Cheetah Conservation. Everything was planned and organized by Hank, who was personable, easy to talk to and willing to accommodate our last minute changes to the plan. I cannot recommend him more highly. Prompt, efficient and attentive, outstanding service and a really nice guy!

Outstanding service again. This is the second trip that we've used Hank and Ulungele Tours and the standard remains consistently high. As well as being very puntual and reliable Hank adds significant value to any tours with his insight and knowledge. This time he took us on a full day Winelands Tour to Paarl and Franschhoek and suggested some excellent vineyards and other stopping points that everyone enjoyed, including our two "youngsters" aged 25 and 23. He also took us on another 6 journeys in and around Cape Town - including a superb trip on a Thursday late afternoon/ evening to the Cape Point Vineyards in Noordhoek. This is a must do trip where lots of local businesses come along and sell a huge variety of hot and cold foods in a beautful setting overlooking the bay, with fantastic wines and beers available too.Hank is a thorough professional and also a really nice guy, all of our family were very impressed and I can't recommend him highly enough.

Thank you, Hank. We hired Ulungele tours for two transfers and one day tour for 4-6 people. Hank was punctual, friendly, knowledgable and reliable. We enjoyed travelling with him and recommend him with pleasure.

Reliable and friendly. We initially only booked Hank for our airport transfer (in February 2013), but were so impressed we subsequently booked the transfer to our second hotel, and return to the airport, via him. He was always on time or early, friendly, knowledgeable about the area, and offered very reasonable rates. Will definitely re-book next time.

Transfer and day tour fantastic. Hank picked us from the airport and took us to our Cape town hotel.the next morning we has a full day Cape peninsular tour which was excellent we saw everything and had a lovely lunch which hank booked for us.we also went to inverdoorm Safari which we enjoyed again hank was excellent in all aspects of our trip .we will definitely recommend him to all our friends and would use his services again on our next trip to Cape town .thank you once again

The only man to safari with!. Hank picked us up from our hotel and took us to an incredible game reserve for a safari. The entire time he would point out things to us along the drive to the game reserve. He's very knowledgeable and funny. We had such a great time with him. The safari had incredible food, great animals and a great staff. Thanks, Hank!

Fantastic . We booked Hank for an airport pickup and the Inverdoorn Safari. The pickup was prompt and Hank explained the scenery on the way into the city centre. The safari was something I was very excited about. Hank picked us up promptly at 6.30 and even waited around whilst the hotel organised a to go breakfast. We then did the long drive to Inverdoorn but Hank told us about various sites as we passed and also had answers to any questions we had. Needless to say we learnt a lot on the way to Inverdoorn. Hank was very attentive organising everything and making sure we had good seats on the safari. The safari was fantastic and we enjoyed our day thoroughly.
