When we are next in Cape Town we will definitely use Hank and his company again.

Transfers by Ulungele Tours. Hank and his other drivers were prompt, polite, and provided excellent service. I booked them for both of our airport transfers, and they also took us out to the Cheetah Outreach for our cheetah run and encounter and waited patiently between the 2 activities. I highly recommend this company!!

Disappointing. I have never written a bad review before, so this makes me very sad to post. We had really enjoyed our trip, which we booked last minute to drive to Knysna and visit other stops along the way. We thought, initially that Hank was a really nice guy, with good knowledge of the region. We had good accommodations, too, which was great.If it were not for the very sour ending at this trip, the review would have been good (not great) - we had great tours in Cape Town and in the wine country, where the organizers made all the arrangements (details included). Hank missed the details a bit and each day, while I appreciated he was leaving room for flexibility, we were left "figuring out" lunch and dinner arrangements for the day - or spending far too long in one spot leaving less time for another. A few misses on lunch/dinner accommodations (never was there an advance reservation made) and then another tour guide had to help us get accommodation in Franschoek as we requested (Hank said there wasn't availability). Otherwise, the trip was fine - we saw the highlights and enjoyed our accommodations.But, sadly, it is in trying times that the true nature of people comes out. When we checked out of the hotel in Knysna, the front desk had our bags - Hank got our bags and put them in the car while we were finishing breakfast. It wasn't until we got back to Cape Town (5 hour drive) that we realized we were missing one of the bags (he only got 1 of the 2 rooms). As we worked to "troubleshoot" how the bag would make it in time for my flight the next morning, his true colors began to show - he refused to get my bag until I paid him an additional $350 (which was nearly half the total cost of my portion of the trip). While I still believed this was HIS mistake, I offered to meet him half way and cover half the expense - he refused, knowing he had me "over a barrel." Very sad, I was late to my final dinner in CPT (that we had to arrange ourselves) because I was, instead, at my B&B setting up a paypal account to ensure he got paid so that I had my luggage. I'm grateful the bag made it and he was able to have it transported to me but this was not a great end to an otherwise wonderful holiday. I'm sure Hank will respond here and claim he has no responsibility for bags and that $350 is a totally reasonable amount to cover gas and payment to his cousin (I did a gas calculator on this and, at most expensive, it cost R659 roundtrip - that's <$60). SO disappointing, he seemed like such a nice guy (my B&B operators were totally floored at how he handled things). No matter the responsibility, I was floored at how quickly it was about blame rather than finding a solution or ensuring his customer had a good holiday/experience. That should have been at the front of his mind, and the first thing - not how he would make a buck on my bad luck.

Hank is fab and we wish him all the best in the future!. We stayed in camps bay and luckily I booked the safari with Hank before we left the UK.Hank was great at communication before we arrived and confirmed the day before also. We were sent a full itinerary so we knew exactly what to expect.Picked up at 6.30am, we were able to sleep/ and learn about South Africa and the area we were driving through. Hank is very passionate and knowledgeable with a bit of banter also :-) We had to stop on the way as someone's pigs had escaped on the road so hank ran to tell the owner and saved the pigs! We also beeped at an ape to save that too! This was all before we reached the safari at inverhorn (can't remember the name). It's much better than the other safaris offered to tourists.Hank ensured we got the best seats on the safari right at the front :-) with the best game driver also (Stanley). The safari was brilliant, we saw every animal possible and got really close too. After this we got a lovely lunch and had a dip in the pool before driving back to camps bay. Overall a brilliant trip, well worth the money and we would definitely recommend Ulungele tours! Thanks Hank!

Class Act!. We had arranged (rather last minute) for Hank of Ullungele Tours to pick us up at the Cape Town airport and shortly after that asked if he could also take us on a tour of the Cape Peninsula the next day. He wrote back promptly, saying he could do the airport pick up but was already booked for the next day. He suggested instead that he would arrange to have a colleague take us on the tour. We agreed, but later received another note from Hank, apologizing to us because his colleague had backed out at the last minute. When we arrived at the airport Hank was right there as promised. He again apologized about the tour and refused to let us pay him because of the mix up. Hank is a lovely and honorable man. We recommend him highly!

Ulungele Tours - Trip Advisor. I looked on Trip Advisor for a Cape Town based safari and found the Ulungele Tours trip to be highly recommended. One report advised doing the overnight trip as this would include two game drives and this is what I experienced. Hanks email communication was excellent, even sorting out my confusion about having to pay in US$ when using Paypal. I agree entirely with the recommendation. The overnight option was brilliant. The whole trip including the drive too and from Cape Town was a real adventure. Seeing the lions and elephants from an open topped vehicle, although perfectly safe, was close enough to give a real thrill, as was being close up and personal with the Cheetas!! The whole itinery, food and accomodation were excellent. I strongly recommend using Hank and Ulungele Tours if visiting Cape Town.

Perfect Safari Trip. Ulungele Tours shuffled my boyfriend and I around from Cape Town to a 2-day safari trip that was fantastic. On the way to the safari, Hank regaled us with information we hadn't learned about Cape Town, local information along the way, and even stopped to allow us to see the winelands that ended up not being a real part of our trip.At the safari, he made sure we were always having a great time, and gave us tips and tricks to get the most out of the safari. A 2-day safari was perfect for us, as we both were into it, but never got to be bored by it (I imagine after 2 days having the attitude of "Oh, hey, another giraffe. Great.")I would recommend this company a hundred times over. They were a true highlight.

Best in Class Service & Experience. Ulungele Tours provided my wife & I an excellent experience while we stayed in Cape Town for a few days at the end of November 2014. Ulungele Tours provided us with our roundtrip airport transfers & Best of the Cape Day Tour. Hank was easy to contact & setup all of our bookings beforehand. Upon our arrival, Hank was already waiting for us in a very easy to spot area in the arrivals hall. During our drive to the hotel, Hank filled us in on all the details of Capetown & the surrounding area. We arrived on a Saturday evening & had no problem getting to our hotel in the heart of Capetown within 25 minutes. We booked the Best of the Cape Day Tour for our 2nd full day in Capetown. It was a perfect day for a tour of the Cape! It was a full day of sightseeing from the drive along Camps Bay to Chapmans Peak Drive down to the Cape Point Nature Reserve over to the Penguins at Bolders Beach all before lunch! The afternoon was perfect in the Stellenbosch region enjoying wine tastings as 3 different vineyards. When the original place we stopped for lunch wasn't open, Hank easily came up with a even better plan for lunch in the town of Stellenbosch. All along the way Hank provided us with his personal knowledge of the rich history in the Capetown region. We wanted to see everything in our short time in Capetown so we definitely picked the right tour one! We returned to our Hotel in time for us to enjoy our last evening in Capetown. Hank returned the next morning to provide us with our return trip to the airport. Hank was right on time & we got to the airport in plenty of time for our flight.We learned so much more of the culture & people that make up the area than doing the drive on our own. We have traveled the world to many different places, taking the large bus tours to the self drive tours but have never done a private tour with our own guide. We couldn't have been happier than choosing Hank as our guide to explore the area. It will make going back to any non-private tour a hard choice again! Hank takes pride in his tour company & it really shows in the way he provides his services. We would recommend to anyone visiting the Capetown area to book an airport transfer, day tour, or even multiple day tours with Ulungele Tours - Hank will make it a trip of a lifetime!

Great day at Inverndoor. We booked a day trip to Inverndoorn game reserve with Ulungele Tours and were not disappointed. We were picked up at our accommodation in Constantia right on time and had a relaxed trip to the reserve with our driver Gerald. The game drive was really nice. It is possible to book it directly and drive there yourself, but we really enjoyed sitting in the back of the car during the three hour drive to fully enjoy the surroundings and even take a nap on the way back.

Excellent airport transfer. Email communication was excellent, Hank was punctional in meeting us at the airport and very knowledgeable on subjects relating to his homeland. While we didn't have time to partake in any day tours prior to our joining a cruise, we would not hesitate in organising any excursions with Ulungele Tours. We wish him and his wife the very best, his company will go far with the service he provides.Bevelyn D.

Super 1-day Safari trip. We just got back from our one day Safari trip with Hank. It was absolutely perfect! Hank picked us up on time at 6:30. We then had a very interesting ride to the game reserve. Hank was able to answer all our questions and also gave us a lot of good facts and figures about SA. The Safari started at around 10:30 AM and the organization was outstanding. After doing the 2.5 h tour, we had lunch and safely returned to Cape Town around 5 PM. All in all it was a very fun trip and I highly recommend it to anyone else!

Excellent Car Transfers Service. Hank the owner was perfect pre-trip with all the email correspondences, so planning and confirming details was a breeze. During the course of the trip in Cape Town we had planned several transfers and each one was on time and we felt welcomed and comfortable. Costs were reasonable as well and Hank was very helpful and even tried to arrange for us a last-minute transfer. Thank you again and we'll definitely use Ulungele again when we come back in the future.

"First Class Personalized Tour". Ulungele Tours is the ultimate private tour company. I was going to South Africa to celebrate my 60th birthday. I selected four tour packages and told Hank how long I would be in Cape Town and to see what he could do. All he did was schedule all four tours nicely. He scheduled the safari on my birthday, what a nice present. At Cape Point we did both light houses. The first one we didn't walk up, but we did walk down. The second we walked there and back. Second time Hank did that walk and the smile he put on my face when he raised both of his arms in triumph. The Wine Lands great!Hank and I looked at vintage cars at one estate. One building with Ferraris. Hank is personal and not just about how many tours you can do, but educating you on how beautiful South Africa is. Hank also likes to give. On one tour he added something special. He took me to were the Indian and Atlantic Oceans converged. When we ate, there was never nothing left on our plates. Hank knows his food. Hank was prompt and a very safe driver. You know really it was just like two old friends riding and talking about the world as we see it. Hank was there down to the very last minute for me. When he came to take me to the airport, he made sure I didn't leave anything behind in my room. Hank thank you for making this a vacation of a life time!Best regards,Clark

A-Grade Personalized Tour Company. For my wife and me, personalized tours are always a prerequisite which is why I went looking for such tour companies and found Hank and his company Ulungele Tours on Trip Advisor. Right from the first time I mailed Hank with a request to send me a 4 day itinerary he was always on top of his game with a super quick reply with just all the details I needed. He was always looking at adding value by providing crucial inputs on where we stayed in Cape Town, which game reserve we visited, where we had our dinners, as well as what the rest of itinerary would look like. What's great about Hank is that is he constantly adapting his proposals and suggestions based on the our needs. He also made sure we made the best possible use of the limited time that we had in Cape Town make sure we got a glimpse of almost everything important. When we finally arrived in Cape Town what we also realized is that Hank is also one of the most knowledgeable tour guides you could possibly find. He would fill us in on not just information about places but also about the history of South Africa, the people, the politics and possibly everything else under the sun. He's an extremely warm person which makes the trip all the more special. Cape Town in itself if a beautiful city and when you experience it with a company like theirs it becomes a memory for life. I would highly recommend Hank and his company to any one wanting to tour South Africa from Cape Town.

Safari Tour. You can't go to South Africa and not go on a Safari Tour. This is absolutely a mustWe choose Ulungele Tours because of the recommendation on Trip Advisor, and it was simply perfect. Hank (owner of Ulungele) picked us up on time. He recommended us to ask the hotel to prepare a breakfast to go as the trip starts at 06.30 in the morning. He stopped on the way for coffee and restroom.Hank not only drives smoothly, he is friendly, humorous, and we enjoyed very much the small talk on the way to the Safari reserve. We learned a lot about the history of South Africa. The Safari Tour itself was sensational. we saw lions, elephants, giraffes, zebras, rhinos, ostrich, capricorn. we took so many photos and the guide explained everything about the animals. The lunch was good, the service too.On our way back we were so tired, we almost slept 3 hours in the car :)Thank you Hank very much for the enjoyable company :)If I go back to South Africa, I will book the tour again with you!

Ulungele is one of the best in Cape Town. I was searching for an airport transfer company for Cape Town end of my family trip. We were a total of 13 people. I found Ulungele's reference over here on TripAdvisor, found another company online and also asked for quote from my hotel (Table Bay). Hank (owner of Ulungele) was not only the quickest to reply, he also gave the cheapest quote. Hank was also available on Whatsapp and gave me quick replies. His communication was one of the reason we hired him. When we met him, realized he has a great personality and sense of humor. He was very helpful and helped us with loading of luggage etc without even asking. If you are going to CapeTown, Hank is by far the best guy you could hire. No gimmicks like switching off air conditioning (to save fuel) - which I have seen others do in South Africa.

Superb two days planning!. We spent two days with Hank - he deserves 10 stars!!The two days we spent together was amazing - we did Cheetah encounter, Cape Penisula tour and whalewatching in Hermanus. Other than the breathtaking views and interesting itinerary, our tour won't be the same without the service from Hank - he is extremely helpful, organised and responsible!For all the emails I sent to Hank (a large amount), he always came back promptly, or he would let me know if he is busy with work and have to get back to me later - he is just very responsible! And he is very patient with all my questions and requests, he tries to do everything he could to accommodate. We were supposed to do whalewatching on the first day, however the weather turned bad and the boat company cancelled. However, Hank still managed to re-plan everything and didn't mind to drive us all the way to Somerest for Cheetah encounter and came back to start the Cape town penisula tour. I understand he must have spend extra gas on that.Hank also checked in with us the day prior to the tour, to make sure everything is going fine and he would let us know what is planned, so we can prepare and pack what we need.During the tour, we met other travellers, he is also very helpful even though they didn't hire him. In addition, he has very good restaurant recommendations and he booked very nice place for us to go to lunch!Other than being very responsible and caring, what impressed us the most is the knowledge and passion he has for his own country - South Africa. He has books about history, religion etc in his car; and we had so much conversations on the economy, politics, geographies, lives in South Africa, etc. I am sure you will find a lot of things that interest you to learn from Hank!I would recommend Ulungele to couples, families and groups of friends. Hank is good with children and he is very patient - you won't regret it!Thanks Hank for such amazing tour!

Amazing Wine Tour. My husband and I wanted to experience the wine lands on our honeymoon to Cape Town. We were so happy we hired Ulungele Tours! Hank was so nice and very knowledgeable about Cape Town. He pointed out things to us that we wouldn't have noticed, explained things, and talked about the history of South Africa. The wineries we went to were great! We never would have been able to achieve what Hank and Ulungele Tours provided for us. Thank you for an amazing Wine Tasting experience!

Perfect Service. We arranged for a transfer from Capetown Airport to our hotel at the Waterfront with Ulengele Tours. The owner Hank greeted us at the airport and transferred us to our Hotel in a very professional manner. I thoroughly recommend Ulengele Tours

Superb experience!. My wife and I chose Ulungele Tours for a day-long safari tour at Inverdoorn Reserve based on the good reviews here and must say we definitely chose well! Hank was very punctual for the early pick up and gave us a lot of interesting information on our way to the reserve. The safari experience was exactly as described in the website. Hank did everything he could to make us feel comfortable and enjoy the experience - which we certainly did I would recommend Ulungele Tours for anyone looking for a great experience with no hassle!

First class transfers. We used Ulungele Tours for multiple transfers during our visit to Cape Town in September. During our communication with Ulungele, they responded timely to all our communications, including when we made a last minute change and yet they responded quickly and were able to accommodate our change. It was so comforting to have a sign with our name picking us up at the airport when we arrived, and during the short drive to our hotel, Hank provided much insight to the area. We also really appreciated the fact that Hank didn't just tell us where to go the next morning, he actually took the time to show us exactly where to go the next morning for a local attraction. They picked us up right on time every time, not a minute late, and we would recommend their service to anyone; in fact, one of my co-workers is going to cape town in November and they have scheduled a tour with Hank and Ulungele. We will make use of their service again when we return to Cape Town in 2015. Thanks again, Hank. J&D

Wonderful!. We used Ulungele Tours for pick up from the airport in Cape Town as well as a transfer to Stellenbosch. Hank was extremely helpful during the planning and patience and always very pleasant with all of my emails. Jared (I think! Sorry if I got his name wrong!!) picked us up from the airport and was wonderful! He was very knowledgeable and gave us plenty of background on Cape Town on our drive to our hotel.Hank did our transfer to Stellenbosch, and it truly was a pleasure! He was so full of knowledge and really gave us information about Cape's history that no one else had. We had to change around our time due to weather and moving activities around, and this was no problem for Hank! Definitely recommend! I now wish we had one more day to do a day tour with Hank as I know it would be wonderful! Hope to use them again in the future! :)

Perfect Cape Town experience!. I was referred to Hank by a friend of mine that had been to Cape Town a few months prior. I had a laundry list of things I wanted to do in Cape Town, but only 3 full days to complete them. When I emailed Hank, he made sure to make 3 full days worth of itineraries, including every single thing I wanted to do. He was very knowledgeable in the history of South Africa and made sure to educate us on our car rides to and from various stops. He warmly greeted us at the airport after a long two days of traveling from Chicago. He immediately grabbed my luggage and joked around with us about something to make us laugh. He was professional, but fun. We invited him to lunch w/ us on one of our stops and we got to learn about his family and kids. He is just an all around nice person that wants visitors to experience Cape Town in the best way possible. He was always early to pick us up and never rushed us to get back to the hotel, ensuring we made the most of every experience. He stopped the car for us to get out and take pictures and always offered to take pictures of my husband and I. He was worth every single penny. Thank you Hank!

Airport Transfer with a bit of education. I used Ulungele Tours for airport transfers during my recent visit to Cape Town. Hank met me when I arrived and we quickly set off for my guest house. During the trip, he gave me a quick overview of the history of Cape Town and the area. He got me to my destination with no problems. The pickup and return to the airport was equally easy and interesting. While I did not use him for day tours, I would imagine they are quite good as he is very knowledgeable and interesting. I recommend Ulungele Tours to anyone visiting Cape Town.

3 Excellent Day Trips in the Western Cape. We used Hank and Ulungele Tours for our transfers and 3 private day tours during our 1 week stay in Cape Town.Hank arranged tours to the Cape of Good Hope, the Winelands and to Hermanus.He was knowledgeable, trustworthy and an excellent host.I would not hesitate to recommend him to anyone planning a trip to the Western Cape.His expertise certainly enhanced our experience of South Africa.Thanks again.

Thanks Hank. My friends and I spent 2 days with Hank. The first day we went whale watching and the second we did table mountain, cape point, cape of good hope, and horseback riding. He also stopped at some nice spots along the way because he knew we were interested in taking pictures. Hank educated us on the Capetown area which made the long car rides very interesting. It was totally worth it to hire a private driver. Especially one so reliable. It was nice to not be rushed by a tour bus full of strangers.

Hank was great!. My girlfriends and I planned a day trip with Hank to Hermanus, he was very knowledgable and a pleasure to spend the day with, we enjoyed our day so much we planned our second day with him to table mountain, cape point and horseback riding! We would recommend Ulungele to anyone visiting Cape Town!!!

Cape Town & Garden Route. Had an amazing trip with Hank visiting Western Cape. We had a private tour for our family including day trips in Cape town and 4 day trip from Cape town to Port Elizabeth.We were able to tailor the trip to our preference and Hank for very helpful in creating our personal itinerary. Hank is a wonderful tour guide with an impressive knowledge of the history & culture of South Africa. Hank is a very good driver, punctual, reliable and arranged a really amazing seafront hotel apartment in Hermanus, we saw whales just 2 mins from our hotel. The drive across western Cape was truly an amazing experience. Great way to explore the region and a wonderful tour guide to experience it with.

Airport transfer - plus. Hank responded quickly to a last minute request for an airport transfer to central Cape Town. He clearly loves his town and the region; an interesting and informative taxi ride. New, clean cars and a polite, prompt service.
Call Hank. Hank was so kind with us awaiting our luggages that were stuck in our conexion and also gave us a lot of information about tour in Cape Town. We really appreciate the services performed.

Call Hank. Call Hank……This is all that you need to do to organize your trips. We were 2 families traveling with 5 kids so were unsure how to manage and plan our days. Hank did this for us, and more. He arranged each and every one of our outings at a reasonable price. Zip lining, Lions head, Para gliding, vineyards…..the list is just endless. Adding last min additional agendas were done with a smile. He was very knowledgeable about CT and its surroundings and answered all our queries. One advise would be to ask him for apartment rentals. He's got some good ones. He's basically a one stop solution to all your needs. We will all miss Hank as much as we will miss Cape Town………one of the best cities in the world.

Great Day Trip and Guide. I really enjoyed our day trip to Cape of Good Hope, Table Mountain, and sight seeing around Cape Town. I made arrangements through email, and Hank always replied back very fast, and answered all my questions. He picked us up at the airport, took us to Simon's Town, and gave us some wonderful tips for us to do on our own while there. He met us again for our day trip to Cape of Good Hope, Table Mountain, and made sure to show us many wonderful sights before dropping us off at the airport. I would highly recommend Hank, and I look forward to seeing him again on our next trip!

Good Day trip to Cape of Good Hope. As everyone has written, Hank is an excellent guide for the day. A bit pricey for just the two of us, but you get what you pay for. Hank knows his business, is an excellent driver, and can answer most any question you might have. Our tour was somewhat standard (Cape of Good Hope with two stops along the way and one stop on our return to Cape Town). But we didn't ask Hank for anything unusual. I have a feeling he would be happy to take you or stop anywhere you like. I am sure he'd find something for you if you didn't have a place in mind. My only criticism is that it is expensive and seems fairly standard (like he's done it a million times). But to be fair -- that's what you want -- someone who has done it a lot. To get more out of it I guess I'd suggest asking for some stops of particular interest to you or your group. Otherwise, I'm with everyone who says, "Call Hank."

Great trip-thank you!. We really enjoyed our tour to Inverdoorn organised through Hank. He was punctual, very knowledgeable and instantly put us at ease. We wish you continued success with your excellent business!

We were a tad late!. Hank picked us up from the Cape Town airport for the transfer to our hotel - our flight was delayed, but Hank was right by the gate waiting. It was only a 30-mins drive, but he managed to give us quite a few a tips on how to maximise our time in the city, shared cautionary notes on what we should watch out for during our stay etc etc. We certainly felt very cI was 15-mins too late a couple of days later to confirm our Cape Point visit with him, and the tour was already booked up - shame! I know Hank and Ulungele Tours would have made our Cape Point visit more memorable if only I had gotten my act together on time!

Don't hesitate to book with Hank. We used Ulungele tours for a few transfers and a best of the cape tour during our honeymoon in Cape Town. To start with we were considering hiring a car but in the end we decided to just use Ulungele Tours and we are so glad we did.We really cannot recommend them enough. From first contact Hank was brilliant and helped us plan our iteniary for our trip. Hank was always on time and his car was immaculate. He was also flexible and nothing was too much trouble, when our shark diving was cancelled due to bad weather he phoned them and rebooked it for us. Hank was very informative and everywhere we drove was pointing things out on the way. What really struck us about Hank though was his passion for his country.The best of the cape trip was excellent. Hank is an encyclopedia of knowledge I don't think there's a question we asked that he didn't know. We hope to return to Cape Town one day and will not hesitate to use Ulungele tours.

Trip to Inverdoorn with Ulungele Tours. I booked a trip from Ulungele Tours that included private shuttles from my hotel in Stellenbosch to Inverdoorn and back to Cape Town airport on the next day, one night in luxury chalet in Inverdoorn, two game drives, cheetah encounter and dinner, breakfast and lunch.My driver, Gerhard, was waiting me at the hotel promptly and we had a nice drives to Inverdoorn and back. We had time to talk about all kinds of things concerning South Africa and my home country during the 2,5 h drives. Only small minus was that there must have been some misunderstanding of the starting time of my first game drive, because I was informed that it leaves at 16:30, but it actually was starting already at 16:00. Luckily we were there at 15:45 so I had time to quickly change my clothes before going for the drive. Otherwise everything went nice and smooth.Thanks for Ulungele Tours & Hank for arranging the trip! I really enjoyed it and would recommend you to others too.

Best driver, best service for a private day tour or transfer. We used Ulungele Tours several times during our stay in Capetown. Hank, the driver, picked us up from the AirPort. He was right in time and with is his Nice, clean van, he drove to our appartment with all the luggage. Afterwards we asked him to bring us and pick us up during New Years Eve. Nothing is a problem. Hank is very friendly. He knows a lot. You also can book private day tours to the f.e. The winelands. I recommend Ulungele Tours

Fantastic Cape Peninsular Tour. My wife and I had a fantastic day with Hank on his Cape Peninsular day tour. I first got in touch with Hank in November 2013 and from day one Hank went out of his way to help me. Hank picked us up at our hotel and from the first minute made us feel as if we knew him for years. Hank was very informative, kind, polite and went out of his way to tell us the history of the areas we visited on his tour. His car was spotless and his driving was excellent.Hank does this tour different to other tour companies and it works very well because we missed the crowds and the queuing in each spot we visited. Hank was very flexible and worked this tour around our interests. We visited all the major sites that we wanted to see on our way like Cape of Good Hope, Simons Town, Cape point and the Penguins. Hank stopped at spots for photographs along the route and we got some of the best photographs of our trip to South Africa here. He gave us good advice in relation to visiting Table Top Mountain. Hank told us that we should visit Table Top Mountain when it was clearer and suggested we go later that day. So we took his advice and visited it on our way back to Cape Town. Hank firstly rang the information office to check the times of the last cable cart. He then dropped us off at the ticket office on our way back to Cape Town. We went up on a clear day and got the best views. This advice was excellent as the next few days in Cape Town the mountain was covered with clouds. He also gave me good driving tips and places to see along our route, for the rest of our holiday on the Garden Route. Our only regret is we didn’t use Hank for our other trips in Cape Town.We hope to return to Cape Town and South Africa in the future and one thing for sure is we will be using Hank and Ulungele Tours to organise our trip.

Excellent Cape Peninsula Tour. Having travelled from The Eastern Cape along the Garden Route we decided to return our hire car and enjoy some downtime in Cape Town but still wanted to see what was out there. After some time trawling the net and using TA we chose Ulungele Tours as the best option to provide what we were looking for and we were not disappointed.My wife and I opted for The Cape Peninsula Private Tour. Our guide was Hank Daries the co-owner of he company.Hank proved not only very knowledgeable of ALL matters South African and beyond but was interesting at the same time. He seemed to know how long you needed to spend at any particular point along the route and answered any questions with factual backing. We saw some magnificent scenery along the way in what was a very full day. It was a delight for me not to do the driving and take it all in.Hank is very flexible and will work around your wishes. He has a very pleasant manner and seems happy to be engaged in conversation the whole time that he is with you. From a practical point of view, he is reliable, on time, his vehicle is spotlessly clean and his driving is exemplary.We booked Hank for our airport transfer at a very competitive rate of ZAR 300.When we return to South Africa we will definitely look to Ulungele once again to meet our needs.

Another Happy Customer!. My daughter and I spent the day with Hank on a Cape Point Day Trip and had a great time. Hank is dependable, friendly, a great driver, and quite knowledgeable about the area. Could not have been better. We also used Ulungele Tours for private transfers between the airport and hotel both ways and Hank's service was excellent. Would use Ulungele Tours again without hesitation.

Excellent!. We used Ulungele Tours for our day trip to Inverdoorn Game Reserve. Hank was excellent. He was timely, professional and very personable. We had quite a lot of questions and he was very knowledgable . I wish I had booked Ulungele Tours for our other trips because the guide makes a big difference and we were not as pleased with other tours . I highly recommend Hank.

To trust!. Used Hank for a private transfer and vehicle hire for the day around Cape Point . Both my wife and I and my parents at 81 years was very pleased.Sunday started with Hank picked me up as agreed at our Guest House in Cape Town at 05:15 for a transfer to a trailrun in Stellenbosch. He had called the day before to confirm the time and place, so I could sleep at ease, safe in the knowledge that I would be picked up as we had agreed on the mail several months earlier. A few hours later he brought the rest of the family. He was 10 minutes late but called and told them, so it was no problem. We had a fantastic day and Hank is a very knowledgeable, neat and nice person. A tip for Hank: If you sit back in the big car, it can sometimes be a bit hard to hear you from the driver's seat. Maybe a microphone / headset could have been a solution in special cases ?That said, we were very pleased with Hank and Ulungele Tours and would highly recommend his company .

Fantastic!. We had a fantastic day with Hank on the Cape Peninsular Tour. He was very informative, kind, polite and good fun. During the tour we saw and learnt so much and he always made sure we were happy and comfortable. It really was the most wonderful day, thank you Hank for making it all so special.

A great experience with Ulungele Tours. Hank and his wife Carmelita,owners of Ulungeletours did a wonderful job with airport transfers, driving me to and from locations in Capetown, and taking me on a private tour to Cape point and the Cape of Good hope. They were reliably on time, always kept in touch and always had a pristine vehicle. Hank provided great tips on driving in SA, was always friendly yet professional, and provided positive suggestions that made me comfortable to explore the city on my own. I would definitely recommend Ulungeletours to any woman travelling on her own to the Capetown area.

Best guide!. We went shark diving and Hank was the best driver, guide and took care of everything. The diving was very professional, secure and we saw 4 sharks that Afternoon. Could not have been better!Thank you! Carl and Therese

Inverdoon Day Trip Safari. Hank collected me from my hotel right on time. After collecting a few others, enjoyed a couple of hours drive to the Inverdoon Lodge and game reserve. Hank pointed out all of the highlights during our drive and constantly engaged us in conversation both about Cape Town and South Africa as well as our homeland. Once we arrived at the Inverdoon Lodge Hank invited us for Tea and biscuits and a little rest from the car trip until our mid morning game drive was ready to commense. Hank made sure that his group (as there were many others) had the best seats available for the game reserve along with the best game reserve driver, Christolph. The game drive was simply marvelous. Saw all of the big 5 and more up close and personal. After the drive, we were treated to a delicous buffet lunch at around 1400. It was fantastic and the offerings quite extensive. The drive back to Cape Town was just as nice as the drive to Inverdoon. Hank continued his informative narrative of the region. I can't wait to visit Cape Town again and hook up with Ulungele Tours to take some more of the excursions that they offer. Hank was awesome. His company and services are highly recommended.

You will enjoy a day with Hank!. My 2 adult children and I spent a week in Cape Town in January of 2014. We spent a day with Hank from Ulungele Tours and also used Hank for our transfer to the airport. I think Hank has a very good balance of being informative but allowing you your privacy. He is so pleasant to be around and is so knowledgable, you can't go wrong by booking a trip with Hank.

Friendly, reliable & professional service. I used Hank and his colleagues (after seeing them recommended on Tripadvisor) for two important transfers when I was in Cape Town last month - important as the first one was to get to a wedding on time, and as the second was to get to a flight to Singapore on time. Both were transfers from Cape Town to Franschhoek so about an hour away. In both Ulungele were very punctual, friendly and obliging. I would recommend them to anybody visiting Cape Town who wants peace of mind that their trip will go smoothly and safely.John

Amazing experience!. Hank provided us with three tours, Shark Diving, Best of Cape and Day Safari. All were early starts but worth it! The sharks were fantasic, the safari was great and the cape tour was amazing. Hank was very knowledgable and very friendly and flexible with times, even when our safari messed up our booking, he adapted and fitted us in! Would recommend everyone visiting Cape Town to utilise his services! Thanks Hank!

Great tours. Hank took us on two separate tours and an airport transfer on our last day:The first, though Stellenbach and some other wine areas. It was a Saturday so we started the morning at the Old Biscuit Mill for some coffee and fresh Oysters. It was insanely busy but a nice place to stop for half an hour or so. The second tour with Hank was down to Cape Point. The drive was beautiful and we made lots of interesting stops along the way. This was the highlight of Cape Town for us. Hank was very friendly and a great guy to spend the day with. The tours were very well done and Hank made it very relaxed with stops along the way. Would definitely contact Hank again.

Hank was the best!. Hank gave us an excellent experience of Cape Town. We contacted him for an airport transfer to a downtown hotel and for a private tour for two days. Although our flight was many hours overdue because of a mechanical problem, Hank was well aware of these many flight arrival changes and was ready to pick us up and escort us safely in our weary condition. He helped us plan an itinerary for the next two days, and we enjoyed a fantastic trip as he showed us around the city and environs. We packed more into our private tours with Hank than we could have possibly done separately on our own! --and all, without rushing, but rather giving plenty of time to absorb the delights and wonders all in. Hank was very knowledgeable of history and culture. He was most courteous and functioned as more than a professional doing his job; he was also like a friend whom you would want to spend time with, being around one who has pride for his city, his country and its history, his family, and career. We consider ourselves extremely lucky to have found him and would highly recommend him to individuals, couples, families and people on business seeing Cape Town and the area. You won't regret your choice.

Annie & Doug Experiences. We booked our day trip safari and airport transfers after reading Tripadvisor reviews. All arrangements worked perfectly and pick-ups and drop-offs were exactly as scheduled. Hank, the owner, drove us to the private safari park, some 3 hours from Cape Town. Hank is a charming and very knowledgeable guide who made our visit a very memorable occasion. Always the gentleman, Hank was constantly alert in meeting all our needs. He's a real example of how to provide excellent customer service in an appealing way. We have no hesitation in recommending Ulungele Tours to you.

You're simply the Best Hank. Better than all the rest.. When we flew back to Cape Town in November we knew exactly who to contact for transport from the airport to our accommodation. We had used Hank in February and I have already raved about it on Trip Advisor. Not only is he excellent value, a superb driver and totally reliable, but the guy is a gem - polite, friendly and a mine of interesting information ( even as an ex-Capetonian I learned so much from him.) Hank was also completely unphased that we had 2 enormous, heavily loaded mountain bikes with us and calmly and expertly loaded them into his vehicle. What could have been a really stressful arrival was handled professionally and smoothly. As I said in my previous review WHY would you use anyone else? And Hank, thanks for showing us how to manoeuvre the bike-loaded trolley through the doorways!

Friendly and great service. We booked this tour after reading the reviews on tripadvisor and because we have 2 girls we didn't want to tag along with other tours just in case our girls got a little over excited. Our tour guide was Tony and he was absolutely amazing. Not only was he very accommodating but he was an absolutely pleasure to spend a day travelling around. He explained things to us, assisted in taking pictures and organized the day in order to fit our kids schedule - this was exactly what we needed in order to see the beauty of South Africa. We were so pleased that we booked our car service for our ride into the wine region and airport pick-up and drop off. Really pleased!!! Great job Tony!!! If we get an opportunity to go back we will DEFINETELY contact Ulungele Tours again.

Simply the best. I chose Ulungele from Tripadvisor as it had excellent reviews from previous clients. My wife and I were not disappointed. Hank, the owner, looked after us for four days and we got see everything you could possible see in that time in the Cape peninsular. His knowledge of the area is first class but above all he is just one of the best people you will ever meet and he will look after your every need.If you are looking to spoil yourself with a private driver day tour you will do no better than to book with Ulungele.Thanks Hank

Superb Guide and tour. I have been a bit late in writing my TA reviews for my SA trip, so this was in Sept 2013. I used Hank on the strength of TA, and I was not disappointed. Hank picked us up from the airport and took us to our hotel when we arrived early morning, punctually and with the utmost politeness. I had also booked a days private tour, the best of the Cape. It was a fabulous day out, Hank, me and my 20yr old son in a car which was perfect for us. Hank is a lovely guy, he is informative, we had such good conversations about SA, from climate, places, people and politics. He really helped to broaden my mind about the Western Cape. Hank is very knowledgeable about the areas he takes you to, and the two oceans restaurant he took us to for lunch was amazing. I intend to return to Sa and when I do, I shall be contacting Hank again!

Fantastic Cape Penninsular Tour. We booked this tour with hank on the 3rd Novand had a fabulous day, we loved every minute of it.Hanks Knowledge and stories were fantastic to hear,the whole day opened our eyes to the beauty of South Africa the sights and beauty of the Cape where breathtaking and one we shall never forget!! and the bonus was, we saw a pod of about 40 Dolphins which was magical!! it left us wanting to return to explore more of South Africa next year.I would highly recommend Ulungele Tours without a doubt!!Thankyou once again for a fabulous day:))Lisa and Mark Haxby
Transfer from and to the airport. The booking was made through Ulungele's website (very well organized) and I could say that we had attention, punctuality and good service.

Great service! Made Cape Town memorable!. Ulungele managed our itinerary in cape town. Hank, who is the owner, was with us through our trip in Cape Town and drove us around the city. I was introduced to Ulungele and Hank through my agent (Safaris4Me) who helped with my bookings in Kruger. We had some bad luck with the weather in Cape Town, but we had Hank as our bright spot. He did everything to switch around our schedules in order to help us maximize our time in Cape Town. He did this with very little follow up from us and was constantly in touch with his contacts, pursuing the next opening for our activities. He is extremely knowledgeable about the history of the country and we had many nice long conversations during our drives. He was very flexible and accommodative of our stops during the day. Although we were driven around it almost felt like we had our own car and were doing our own thing! Certainly recommend Ulungele and Hank, for the high quality service that he provides! Our Cape Town experience wouldn’t have been as much fun if not for Hank!

No need to use anyone else:-). I booked Ulungele tours after reading the reviews on trip advisor and I have to say what a top guy Hank is. He immediately put me at ease on arrival to his beautiful city, Hank was so easy to talk too he informed me of the history of Cape Town and pointed out numerous places of interest. By the time we had arrived at my hotel we had decided upon a plan for my final day in Cape Town. Hank arranged to take me on the best of the Cape tour and a couple of wine tasting sessions in Stellenbosch. The day was an absolute blast, one of the best days I have ever had whilst on holiday. We covered some mileage but it was well broken with stops at all the major sites of interest. If you book one of these trips ask to go to the best fish and chips restaurant in the cape (I guarantee you won't be disappointed). I don't think at any point during the day we didn't talk, Hank is such a genuinely friendly and professional person that he is so easy to talk with. I wish him all the best with his business and I am sure his knowledge and personality will see him have every success. Thank you for a great tour and I would not hesitate in booking you for my next adventure to Cape Town.

Efficient transfer. Hank met us at Cape Town Airport on our arrival for the first time in South Africa. He was welcoming and friendly. We had booked him for our transfer to Camps Bay. He had been prompt in his replies during the booking process and well priced in comparison to others. On the short journey, he pointed out sights and gave us tips about holidaying safely in the area.

Hank is the best. Just came back from an incredible visit to this beautiful part of Africa...had been talking to Hank via e-mail before the trip about the tour and expectations...well, he exceeded himself. He's not only very knowledgeable about his country and area, but also very pleasant, polite and formal person ready to go out of his way to please his customer. Hank picked us up in our CapeTown Central hotel, then we went from Capetown to Cape Alguhas, then to Hermanus to see the whales. On our way to Cape Alguhas we stopped at Pascal's in Napier, a French country style café for a capuccino which was delish. This trip was amazing and just seeing the whales in the bay leaping out of the water was breathtaking. Going to Cape Alguhas, the real tip of Africa, was an adventure. You literally stand on a rock right between where the Atlantic and Indian Oceans meet. BTW, very, very rough waters as expected. It also had a very pretty lighthouse Afterwards we went to a very nice seafood restaurant for lunch in Hermanus where the food was very good. There was a "whale" festival in Hermanus at this time with music, dancing and food everywhere. It really was a beautiful trip since we were hugging the coastline during the whole trip back to Capetown. Hank was pointing out places and their stories to us and taking time to answer our many questions. He is also a safe driver, too.In a nutshell, our family recommend Hank 100% for a tour of CapeTown and its environs with the utmost certainty...he will make your trip worthwhile in every way and you will gain the knowledge that only comes first-hand from an expert in this area and country. Thanks for reading my review.

Great guy - Great Service. We intially used Ulungele tours for an airport transfer but later booked for a winery tour as well as return transfer to the airport. Hank was Great!. Apart from being on time, patient and informative, he was sincerlery interested in making sure that we had a good time and enjoyed everything that Cape Town has to offer. Pricing was also very competitive.My wife and I travel often so know great service when we experience it. I'd highly recomend Hank and his company.

Excellent private day tours in Cape Town. We had two excellent days with Hank in Cape Town. We did the Winelands and also the Cape Point tour. The drive along the coast was a highlight as was the Boulders Penguins. We had a beautiful lunch in Franschoek on Hank's recommendation. We really appreciated Hank's flexibility and also the knowledge he shared about Cape Town and South Africa in general. Cape Town is a beautiful part of the world and I would highly reccomend Hank to anyone who is visiting. He is an extremely friendly and knowledgable guide.

Why would you use anyone else?. We used Ulungele airport transfer for the first time last year and would unhesitatingly highly recommend them to anyone. The service is outstanding. They arrived early and waited patiently for us. When we left some papers in the car they went out of their way to return them to us. Hank's service is reliable, professional and good value. We wouldn't consider using anyone else.It takes such a weight off our minds to know that Hank will be waiting for us again this year to transport both ourselves and our bicycles.

Great Tour Company. My husband and i were in Cape Town in August. We used Ulungele Tours for a day trip to Gansbaai Bay to go shark diving. We highly recommend this adventure and this tour company. What a great experience. Our driver, Hank, was very social and knowledgeable. It was interesting to learn about the history of South Africa while viewing the beautiful scenery. We would love to return to SA and take our time exploring all the beauty, fine dining and wonderful vineyards that SA has to offer!!

Used Ulungele for transport in Capetown. They were awesome. We were in Capetown in April on a cruise. We used Ulungele to take us to the Cheetah Outreach. The service was awesome. Our driver met us at ship and was early. He answered all our queries about SA and was very polite and informative. He waited while we were visiting the outreach. I just wish I had researched them more before we went so we could have booked other excursions through them. Would definitely use them if I get back to Capetown.

Great Service From Ulungele Tours. I recently went to Cape Town for the e-tourism summit and made use of Ulungele tours for the airport transfers. What great service! It sure takes the stress out of travel knowing that there is professional, reliable service. They were even waiting outside the apartment over an hour early to make sure they did not get held up in morning traffic. Thanks Hank & Tony! Will definately use you in future.

excellent in all ways. we visited cape town from 14 august to 19 august . the night before i was going to cape town i emailed hank because i did not had planned any tours i was totally blank that what will i do in cape town. next morning hank gave me a reply and asked me that he can pick me from air port and then will decide which tour we want . he was very friendly and with minimum payment for airport transfer he picked us from airport . from air port to hotel i discussed with him what kind of tours we want and in addition to that he was the person who wanted to save our money too. for the first day he told me to three things and made our bookings for robbens island . for next three days he made tours with us from morning to the evening and we saw whole of cape town with him and shared his experince and knowledege with us. and one thing that i will not forget is that for our first day we made him waited for one hour as we were late and he was so kind with us that he said that it happens so nice of him .he is good tour guide plus he wanted to save our money too.on my last day he droped us too the airport. i will again book him for my trip to cape town for new years with my friends.hank hats off to you my family enjoyed each day with you .

Excellent Service From Ulungele Tours!. We visited Cape Town in July, 2013 and right from the planning stages, Hank was very helpful, professional and never kept me waiting for a response. Hank helped plan the itinerary for our group of 11 and was great at taking the needs of everyone in the group into consideration. In addition to that, he has a great knowledge of the history and stories of Cape Town. I will definitely be using his services when we visit Cape Town again.
Friendly, efficient, on time.. Hank has become my go-to guy for all my Cape Town airport transfers. He has always been on time, friendly, efficient and helpful - exactly what I need.

Perfect Inverdoorn experience. Let me start by saying I know that there are nosafari experiences like Kruger close to Cape Town. With this in mind, neither my husband nor I had previously gone on safari, and wanted to see the Big 5 since we were in SA. This was a great introduction, and completely met our expectations.We also knew that we were coming to Cape Town during the rainy season, so needed to have some flexibillty with our day tour dates. Hank was understanding and flexible - after having contacted him from the U.S. and making tentative dates in advance, we confirmed the safari a couple of days beforehand once we knew the weather forecast for the next couple of days. Our driver, Tony, was punctual in picking us up from our hotel, personable, and knowledgeable about the region. He was a great representative of the tour company.I whole-heartedly recommend Ulungele Tours, and hope to be able to use them again in the future on a repeat visit to Cape Town. Thanks, Hank!

Hank is awesome. I had a quick trip in Cape Town last week. I found Hank from TripAdvisor and contacted him regarding a sightseeing tour to Cape Point with airport transfer service. Hank was very professional, easy to talk with. I am very satisfied with his service. Just one thing, I wish he could bring a Binoculars in his car :) there are so many cute animals he showed me however some are in the distance.

Ulungele Tours/Hank. We are a family of 4 who have just finished a three week trip of a life time to South Africa.We started and finished in Cape Town.In Cape Town we needed numerous transfers/airport pick ups and drop offs some early am.Hank and Ulungele Tours were FANTASTIC!Allways on time.Very polite,friendly,knowledgeable.If we had more time we would have used his company for the other services they offer.Hank it was a pleasure to have met you and used your company.I look forward to returning to Cape Town and using your services.

Second Visit. Need to express our sincere Thanks to Hank and Ulungele Tours for once again making our trip to Cape Town so memorable. My Husband and I found this firm last year and we did put in a review. We have used a second time as we knew we could depend on Hank and were not disappointed. We had done several trips with Hank previously which was kept on record and on the initial booking for Airport transfers we asked for some ideas for day trips. Hank came up with several options (a different Wine route for one) and we visited Riebeek Valley, a beautiful historic town Tulbagh and Breede River Valley. The scenery was absolutely stunning! Never rushed, driving excellent and safe and his knowledge of his country and the places we visited 'second to non'. Thank you Hank, we will be back in SA late 2014 and are hoping to get back to Cape Town during our travels. We now look on hank as a 'friend' and he will be our first point of contact before we return.

Great service with Ulungele Tours. I took the Cape Point tour and the Game Safari tour with Hank. Hank picked me up at my guest house. He is very friendly and knowledgeable about the Cape Town area. His van was in great condition and clean. I enjoyed my time spent with Hank.

Very satisfied. Ulungele Tours is a very good company.We booked with us for a transfer from Cape Town to Gansbaai.The driver Hank was very nice and on time for to pick up us at the hotel,he was great too for to answer at our questions about that we have to see on the way.You will be very satified with their service.Sébastien from France.

Great service and a nice chap!. We booked Hank for airport pick-up and drop-off, and he was prompt and efficient. We also did a day trip with him to The Cape of Good Hope, and enjoyed his company and hearing about life in South Africa. His car was well maintained and he drove well. Thanks, Hank for returning to the airport when we discovered our B&B keys a few minutes after you left, and for dropping them off at the B&B. We can recommend Hank's friendly and excellent service.

The only transport you need in SA is Hank and Ulungele Tours. Hank arranged transport for our class of 35, he was professional, courteous, very well versed in the ins and outs of travel throughout SA. I used his services even after our class was over. I want to get back to SA and will ABSOLUTELY be contacting Hank to show me more of the beautiful country. Have him recommend a shark diving trip...amazing!!!

Top. We have used Ulungele Tours already twice (in different years) for tranfers. The service is accurate, friendly and fairly priced. Have recommanded the company to a large SA tour operator.Thanks Hank, we might see you again in the future.Regards from Holland.

Serious, accurate and fair priced taxi/transport service. I have ordered in Switzerland by e-mail a taxi-transport during the night from Capetown Airport to Somerset West. Hank from Ulungele Tours was in time waiting for us, helped to carry our luggage and drived save and smooth with a clean car to our destination. The price was really fair. He was very friendly and trustworthy. So we called him within the next days for several tours/transports again.

5 Star rating for a 5 Star service. On the recommendation of Hank we booked a day trip to Inverdoorn Game reserve which turned out to be the highlight of our holiday. From start to finish Hank kept in touch, contacting us the night before to confirm pick up times the next day, he called again in the morning of the trip to let us know exactly when our car would be there. Hank called again later that evening to make sure we were happy with his service and to see if we had enjoyed our day. My wife and I would definately book through Ulungele tours again.Thank you Hank for all of your help.
Great airport service. Our driver was waiting for us when we arrived. He was very friendly and answered all our questions on the drive to our hotel. We were very satisfied with our transfers.

Great Personalized Service. We spent five days in Cape Town with Hank as our driver and guide. Right from our airport pick-up until our drop off when we left, he was always on time. He made suggestions as to what to see and do while we were in the area and planned many activities for us. He knows the area, wildlife and history, and is able to share it as he takes you to the many attractions. His vehicle was spacious and well maintained. I would highly recommend Ulungele tours to anyone travelling in the Cape Town area.

Excellent service all around. From the airport pick up to airport drop off Hank did a wonderful job for our group of 7 in Capetown. In addition to the airport transfers,we also did 4 day trips with Hank and from picking us up to being flexible, it was a great service -we did wine country, Cape of good hope, table mountain tours and it was all first class. I recommend Hank very highly

First-class service and comfort. Hank at Ulungele Tours helped make our stay in the Western Cape really successful. We used his company 6 times during our trip including airport runs and trips to Franschhoek, Camps Bay and Stellenbosch. He was always right on time and his vehicles were immaculate and spacious for our group of 8. Everyone commented on what a safe and courteous driver he was and you never felt rushed or stressed.Hank was also very flexible to any changes in itinerary we had and was happy to make (very good) inputs into things for us to see and do. He clearly takes a lot of pride in the service he provides and we found Ulungele to be of very good value. We will definitely use him again on our next trip to Cape Town and wouldn't hesitate to recommend him.

Transfer from airport to hotel. Hank from Ulungele Tours met us at the airport - he was already waiting with our names on a card. The price was extremely reasonable and Hank was friendly and helpful pointing out different buildings and interesting facts on our way into the city. He also gave us a few tips on getting around Cape Town cheaply. I would certainly contact Hank again when visiting Cape Town and would recommend him to anyone else.

Wonderful service and warm welcome to SA. We recently visited SA, having visited once before we remembered that taxi hire can be pretty expensive. We requested a quote from BA Holidays, who we were using for the hotel, and they were far to expensive.I then looked up a service and found HANK at Ulungele tours ...the price was amazing and we were picked up in style with a name plaque as we walked out of the arrival gate....and them experienced a great delivery to our hotel by Tony. Tony is a warm and informative young man, who told us many things we hadn't knew from our previous trip !On going back to the airport, Ulungele gave us a discount on the trip....we had flight problems and I had to change the collection time three times ! None of it as a problem, we were collected by Hank, who owns the company ....great guy....we would always use this company...and for a safari trip next time ( cheaper than all the other firms) as they have numerous places of interest that they cover ! Thanks Hank...

Biker. I used Ulungele Tours (Hank) to collect us from the airport with our bike's, just prior to the Cape Argus race. He was great. Very punctual, with a comfortable, clean vehicle and was very helpful dealing with our luggage and very enthusiastic about offering us tips on what to do. I would recommend him to anyone and would use him again.

Ulungele Tours. We visited Cape Town in March 2011 & used Ulungele Tours (Hank) for the airport transfers and a day out to Cape Point, visiting many places en route. It must have been good as we visited Cape Town again in March 2013 & engaged the services of Hank once again during our stay. Hank is a very good driver, punctual and reliable. In addition to the airport transfers we asked Hank to suggest a few things to do for a couple of days out during our stay. We were not disappointed: Riebeeks Valley, Kasteel Mountains, The Royal Hotel in Kasteel (oldest hotel in SA), Tullbagh (hit by an earthquake in 1969), Bains Kloof Valley drive, Franschhoek, Drakenstein Mountains along with many wine tasting establishments en route etc., two great days out! Hank is very knowledgeable and provides lots of information giving a great incite into the history & current issues surrounding SA. Ask him a question & he always has an answer! Great guy who we would recommend to anyone looking for an interesting time in Cape Town & the surrounding areas. See you next time Hank!
Fantastic. Hank is friendly, reliable and offers a service second to none. His knowledge is superb and I would highly recommend his services
Top. We traveled with 10 persons one week through Cape town area.Hank was our driver, a very good driver. Reliable correct and very flexibel.So our experience with Ulungele Tours are perfect.

Ulungele tours. We used Hank to pick us up from Cape Town airport on 12 February 2013 and take us back to the airport on 27 February. He provided an efficient professional service in an air conditioned mini van. We would have used him for tours during our stay if friends hadn't hired a car. Excellent service and would recommend him to others visiting Cape Town

Airport transfer and day trip to Cape Point. I was let down by my travel agent regarding airport transfer from Cape Town airport to the V&A Waterfront Hotel. I contacted Hank by email and was amazed by his quick response. The cost of transfer was good andconfirmation was received all within an hour of initial contact, very impressive. My wife and I arrived at CT airport to be met by Hank at the approporiate time and place. Hank was very polite and gave a good fisrt impression of both himself and the country. We were delighted with his service and booked a day tour with his Company during our stay in CT. The day tour took us to Cape Point, Cape of Good Hope, Simons Town, Stellenbosch with wine tasting all of which was interesting and well organised. I would recommend Ulungele Tours to anyone visiting Cape Town.

Excellent Service. Used Ulungele Tours (Hank)for Our Airport Transfers, Good Price.was waiting at Airport for us and return from Hotel once again first Class,we where only in Cape Town a couple of days if we where staying longer would of gone on one of there tours! Alan

Great service and a rare quality- honesty.. Cannot speak more highly of Hank and his team. My cab arrived at my hotel on time (4am) for my early flight to Johannesburg. The driver was friendly (despite the hour) and the drive to the airport was pleasant. After checking-in I realised I lost my wallet. Hoped and prayed it slipped out of my pocket in the cab. I was on my way to Brazil via Johannesburg and was fearing the worst including missing my flight in order to deal with the lost/stolen wallet when Hank appeared out of no-where, confirmed my identity and handed my wallet back to me. Never been so impressed and surprised in my life. I had resigned myself to the worst. The feeling of elation cannot be quantified.To Hank and the driver (whose name I cannot remember unfortunately, think it was Denzel), I would recommend you and your company to anyone travelling to Cape Town and that was the case even before my wallet was delivered to me personally by Hank!

Great Service!. I used Hank for a recent holiday to CT. I contacted him a few weeks before my trip and he replied within 20 minutes. I used Ulungele only for return airport transfers as I know CT well and had a car hired for the majority of my trip however it was clear from our short trip that he would have been a great choice for any day trip as he was friendly, knowledgeable and had a spacious, air-conditioned mini-van. We extended our trip due to the snow in London and Hank was able to change our pick up date with no hassle. Overall I can highly recommend.

Ulungele tours, the most reliable part of our MSC ship holiday.. I contacted Hank from Ulungele tours via the internet and had nothing but great service from his call.Hank met us at the airport as organised. Hank delivered what he agreed upon. Hank was a call away when we had to be collected at the harbour. Hank was there to collect us and deliver us safely and promptly to the airport.Thanks Hank for a sterling first class service. Wish all companies could follow your work ethics!!When we need transfers in the Cape again you will be our first choice.Thanks so much!!

Carvers - United Kingdom. We found Ulungele Tours on line when looking for transfers from Airport to Hotel in Cape Town, we made enquiries from the UK with regards to cost and although we made several enquires to other firms Ulungele was the best quote and they were also more professional in their response. We were so impressed with the service we had on the transfer with Hank that we booked several trips with him whilst we were there and cannot fault the service we received! Hank was extremely knowledgable about his country and all aspects from tourism, politics, history and even the weather recommending which trips when etc. On all occasions he was 'on time', we were not rushed on the tours we did, which included stopping longer on the wine tour than anticipated! All trips were well organized, Hank was full of enthusiasm, friendly, and the main thing, an excellent driver who my husband, our friends and myself felt very 'safe' with. We shall be visiting Cape Town again this year and will not hesitate to use Ulungele Tours again.

Excellent service. I found these guys online when booking a flight from Durban to Cape Town,needed a transfer to a hotel at the waterfront and Ulungele Tours where quick to respond with a quote which was very reasonable. The driver met us at the airport, vehicle was clean and driver very courteous. We then booked the driver for the following morning to go back to the airport for our flight back to Australia, again he was at the hotel waiting, I'd definitely recommend Ulungele Tours

Professional, friendly, and knowledgable!. My husband and I recently returned from a trip to South Africa. We booked a day tour of the Peninsula and Winelands with Ulungele Tours and it was one of the best days we had during our trip! Hank met us at our hotel in the morning and drove us around all day in a very comfortable van. We found him to be very friendly, professional, and knowledgable about the Cape Town area! He provided us commentary on the wildlife, geography, history, languages, and then political and economic climate in South Africa. We were really impressed with his knowledge. And I can't believe how much we saw in one day: seals in Hout Bay, ostriches, baboons, Cape Point, Cape of Good Hope, the lighthouse, penguins on Boulders Beach, Stellenbosch, and wine tasting at Spier Estate! If you're limited on time in Cape Town, I definitely recommend this tour. Or he has plenty of other tours to choose from. They are priced affordably (I shopped around a bit before I booked) and he will answer your emails with any questions promptly. You really can't go wrong with this company. We highly recommend Ulungele!!!

Very nice tour!. It was a very great tour! Brendan was really engaged in giving us tourist the best tour. Nice local food and sneaks. Very well thought of program, good and cheap way to see both Cape Point and Cape if Good Hope in one day. Overall a good experience!

Great tour, very personal!. Brendan was a great tour guide, he knows so much nice things to tell you. He is very patient and takes you to the right places. Definately a recommended tour! Kind regards, Dennis

An amazing adventure. We wanted to go down to the cape of good hope on our own but when we heard of the company and the itinerary we decided to join the tour. Brendan was incredibly professional, interesting and fun and we had a great time!!!If I could give a higher ranking I would give them a 10 out of 10!Thank you so much (:

Cape Point Tour in South African Spring. It was a lovely tour through the nationalpark! I met some interesting people and saw one of the most famous sights in South Africa. Unfortunatly, there wasn't enough time to take the path to the front cliffs at Cape Point or to go to the beach. All in one, a great tour with a typical lunch!

Fantastic day. Such a great day with a super friendly guide - Ziggy. She had great knowledge of Cape Town to share with us and took us to some awesome places. Seeing the penguins was incredible and also really enjoyed the walk around the Cape of Good Hope and Chapman's Peak Drive. Would definitely go again when I go back to Cape Town!

Fantastic Service. What a great trip! From pick up to drop off Brendan and Ziggy were fantastic. They went above and beyond to ensure that everyone had a great day, very informative and thorough, all advertised inclusions included, lunch was delicious, overall a fabulous day! We would highly recommend Lucky and Lost and very happy with the service provided. Thank you B&Z
A Lovely day. We saw some beautiful places, also hiked up to the light house and then down to the cape of good hope. Ziggy the tour guide was awesome .
Great. How can you not think Ziggy is the bomb, wherever her name came from. We had a great time and we hope all easy people like them too.

The Best tour of Cape Town. A luxury this tour to discover a magnificent Cape Town. In one day you can see the most representative of the city, and believe me if I tell you it's not easy. The beso Brendan And his way of conveying his passion for this beautiful city. Highly recommended .

awesome experience!. they picked us up at time and the bus has been very comfortable and clean:) after heading to the stunning colourful houses in one of the parts in capetown we drove around capetown and saw the muitzenberg beach from above and afterwards we drove to the place where the penguins are living.... but far out my favourite destination was cape point and cape of good hope! I have never seen such a beautiful scenery! and ziggy and Brendan were amazing guides, they could basically answer every question we asked them and prepared delicious food for us! So everything was fine and it was a really good way to discover amazing places in and around capetown :-)
Fantastic!. I recommend to everyone who wants to have fantastic trip through Cape of Good Hope!!! Very nice atmoshere and professionalizm!!! :-)

Enjoyed the day a lot. Brendan was a quite friendly person who answered all our questions and told us lots of interesting things. It was at no time boring and so we had all in all a really relaxing awesome day.
Perfect Day Trip to Cape Point. We had a realy nice trip to the Cape point and area around, with lovely and deliceous meal, lecker views and great guids! Thank you!

Super Erlebnis! Great Experience!. Ganz viele tolle Eindrücke innerhalb kürzester Zeit. Gute Organisation und tolle Guides. If you only have short time to visit Cape Town you should definitely do the tour to get the most out of it!!

Great trip!. fantastic trip for a whole day. Price definitely corresponds to the activities. Great guide with amazing parking and driving skills. Very informative but funny at the same time. Certainly to recommend!

Beautiful Day. This tour was amazing, we got picked up from our hostel and was greeted by our friendly tour guide. It was different to other tours we have been on but I loved it, felt like we were on a mini road trip as traditional South African music played. We stopped at Boulders beach, had a lovely home cooked traditional South African curry and a beautiful walk along the Cape of good hope. And to top it off some lovely local wine looking at the view.

Amazing Day. The Day with Ziggy was awesome. Not only Because of the beautiful places that Ziggy showed us but especially Because of Ziggy. You feel and See that she loves what she is doing and loves Capetown.
amazing tour!. We had a amazing tour with brendan to boulders beach, cape the good hope and lots of other great spots. We recommend them because of the personal caracter of the tour.

Best Day Tour I've Ever Done. A very thoughtful, personal, and genuine trip; it really did feel like a road trip with six new friends. All of the places visited were spectacular, some that I wanted to see but were difficult to get to on my own, and the others I didn't know about but am so glad the tour introduced me to them. What we did and saw throughout the day was incredible, but two weeks after what stands out the most was how personal and honest the day was. Highly recommend!
Fantastic. Such a fantastic tour. Ziggy and Brendan were so amazing and friendly as well. They put some personal touch on this tour. Glad that I've joined this tour.

Perfect Day trip!. If you're looking for a day exploring the Cape, make sure you get onto Lucky and Lost tours. I was torn between a wine tour and a cape tour as I had limited time, but this was a perfect way to combine the two. All bases were covered throughout the trip, with an amazing vibe thanks to our guide Ziggy! Not only due to her extensive knowledge on the area, but also her vast local connections and interest in the passengers' experiences and knowledge. I don't think anyone could not have a good time with guides showing this much passion and enthusiasm for what they do.Amazing scenery and experiences, with the flexibility to cater to groups of different age dynamics. Great South African food also prepared for us by our guide, as well as sampling some of the local delights.Thanks again to Ziggy and Lucky and Lost Tours, couldn't have asked for a better day on the Cape!
Peninsula. Excellent! The guide was absolutely fantastic!! Highly recommend it...for a tour of the peninsula and the wine tasting ended he day nicely.
Great way to see the peninsula. Guide was friendly and knowledgable. Good tour for younger people, has a more hip feel to it. Fantastic lunch as well!

GREAT - PERSONSL - PROFESSIONAL - HOST. For a wonderful insightful day around The Cape and MORE - look no further, small personal tours, with bespoke commentary...! Exceptional Value - SCORE 9/10. Thank you. Antony Around The World TravellerFB: Foxy Boxy Around The World 2016Freelance Travel Writer and Photographer - Hong Kong

Ziggy spread her Stardust !. We had two days in Cape Town , far too short, but "Luckily" we chose this tour . The weather that day was not good , heavy rain , but Ziggy brightened up the day with her love for Cape Town that shone through the rain. Very informative, as being a local, she understands much about the culture and heritage of the place . The pace of the tour was adjusted to make the most of the weather , she took advantage of local connections to work out the best places to visit that day . Great commentary , and music, throughout the trip and after one day we had such an insight to the delights of Cape Town and the Natutionl Park . Highly recommended .
